Item.Name: MENU
Item.TreeDataQuery:
select -1,LEVEL,node_name,'',NODE_ID from wizmenu_ERP
WHERE SHOW_IN_MENU='Y'
connect by prior node_id = node_parent 
START WITH NODE_PARENT IS NULL 
ORDER BY NODE_ID

Trigger.Name: WHEN-TREE-NODE-EXPANDED
Trigger.TriggerText:

Trigger.Name: WHEN-TREE-NODE-ACTIVATED
Trigger.TriggerText:
DECLARE
 N_NAME FTREE.NODE;
 PATH VARCHAR2(500);
 PATH_R VARCHAR2(300);
 A NUMBER;
 lnod_node_parent FTREE.NODE;
 plst_id PARAMLIST; 
 p_list PARAMLIST;
 label_name VARCHAR2(100);
 p_label_name VARCHAR2(100);
 form_name VARCHAR2(100);
 lvch_label_name VARCHAR2(100);
 lvch_form_name VARCHAR2(100);
 form_id FORMMODULE;
 lnum_dash_pos NUMBER; 
 lnum_permission_yn NUMBER(1); 
 
 /*********abid*************/
 lvch_val_length VARCHAR2(100);
 cursor clm_returen(parm_tbl_name varchar2) is SELECT * FROM WIZ_REPORT_DEFINITION
 WHERE UPPER(TABLE_NAME)= UPPER(parm_tbl_name);
 LRTYPE_RPT_DEF WIZ_REPORT_DEFINITION%ROWTYPE;
 RPT_PATH VARCHAR2(1000);
 
 CMP_NAME VARCHAR2(50);
 FIRST_CLM_NAME VARCHAR2(50); SECOND_CLM_NAME VARCHAR2(50); THIRD_CLM_NAME VARCHAR2(50);
 FOURTH_CLM_NAME VARCHAR2(50); FIFTH_CLM_NAME VARCHAR2(50); SIXTH_CLM_NAME vARCHAR2(50);
 SEVENTH_CLM_NAME VARCHAR2(50); EIGHTH_CLM_NAME VARCHAR2(50); NINTH_CLM_NAME VARCHAR2(50);
 TENTH_CLM_NAME VARCHAR2(50);
 lnum_loc NUMBER(3);
 TBL_NAME VARCHAR2(100);--:= FTREE.GET_TREE_NODE_PROPERTY('MENU',:SYSTEM.TRIGGER_NODE,FTREE.NODE_VALUE);
 
 frm_name VARCHAR2(100);
 RPT_NAME VARCHAR2(50);

 
 /*********abid*************/
/************* SHAHZAD ***********/
lnum_node_id WIZMENU_ERP.NODE_ID%TYPE;
lvch_parameters WIZMENU_ERP.MENU_PARAMETERS%TYPE;
/************* SHAHZAD ***********/
 
BEGIN
BREAK;
 N_NAME := :SYSTEM.TRIGGER_NODE;
 IF (UPPER(FTREE.GET_TREE_NODE_PROPERTY('MENU',Ftree.Get_Tree_Node_Parent('MENU',N_NAME),FTREE.NODE_LABEL)) NOT LIKE '%SEGMENT%') THEN
 lnum_node_id := FTREE.GET_TREE_NODE_PROPERTY('MENU',N_NAME,FTREE.NODE_VALUE);
 ELSE
 lnum_node_id := NULL;
 END IF;
 
 BEGIN
 SELECT NODE_NAME, NODE_PATH, MENU_PARAMETERS INTO lvch_label_name, PATH, lvch_parameters
 FROM WIZMENU_ERP 
 WHERE NODE_ID = lnum_node_id;
 EXCEPTION
 WHEN NO_DATA_FOUND THEN
 lvch_label_name := NULL;
 PATH := FTREE.GET_TREE_NODE_PROPERTY('MENU',N_NAME,FTREE.NODE_VALUE);
 lvch_parameters := NULL;
 NULL;
 END; 
 --PATH := FTREE.GET_TREE_NODE_PROPERTY('MENU',N_NAME,FTREE.NODE_VALUE);
 IF (PATH IS NOT NULL) THEN
 A:=INSTR(PATH,'\',-1);
 PATH_R:=SUBSTR(PATH,A+1); 
-------------------------------------IF PATH IS NULL---------------------------------------
 --lvch_label_name:=FTREE.GET_TREE_NODE_PROPERTY('MENU',N_NAME,FTREE.NODE_LABEL);
 lvch_form_name:=substr(path_r,1,length(path_r)-4);
 --IF lvch_label_name=
 END IF;
 IF PATH IS NULL THEN
 MESSAGE('NO DETAIL AVAILABLE!',NO_ACKNOWLEDGE);
 null;

-------------------------------------PATH IS NOT NULL--------------------------------------

 ELSE 
 form_name:=substr(path_r,1,length(path_r)-4);
 
-------------------------------------CHECK IF CHK_PATH IS 1-------------------------------- 

 IF :CHK_PATH=1 THEN

-------------------------------------IF FILE EXT IS FMX------------------------------------ 

 IF SUBSTR(PATH_R,LENGTH(PATH_R)-2)='FMX' OR SUBSTR(PATH_R,LENGTH(PATH_R)-2)='fmx' THEN
 --label_name:=FTREE.GET_TREE_NODE_PROPERTY('MENU',N_NAME,FTREE.NODE_LABEL);
 label_name := lvch_label_name;
---------------------------------Vouchers Authorization Systes-----------------------------
 lnum_dash_pos:=INSTR(LABEL_NAME,'-');
 IF lnum_dash_pos > 0 THEN
 IF SUBSTR(LABEL_NAME,1,lnum_dash_pos-2)='Ready To Send For Approval' THEN
 p_list := get_parameter_list('p_list');
 IF NOT id_null(p_list) THEN
 destroy_parameter_list(p_list);
 END IF;
 p_list := create_parameter_list('p_list');
 add_parameter(p_list,'PARM_VIEW',text_parameter,'MENU');
 lnum_permission_yn := FUN_CHECK_PERMISSION(form_name,NULL,NULL,PCKG_GCNSTS.pnum_login_emp,PCKG_GCNSTS.pnum_set_of_book_id); --Form Name,Sub Function,Action is Passed
 IF lnum_permission_yn = 1 THEN
 OPEN_FORM(PATH,ACTIVATE,SESSION,SHARE_LIBRARY_DATA,P_LIST);
 ELSE
 MESSAGE('You don''t have permission to Run this Option. Please Contact your Administrator.');
 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE;
 END IF;
 ELSIF SUBSTR(LABEL_NAME,1,lnum_dash_pos-2)='Rejected Vouchers Received' THEN
 p_list := get_parameter_list('p_list');
 
 IF NOT id_null(p_list) THEN
 destroy_parameter_list(p_list);
 END IF;
 
 p_list := create_parameter_list('p_list');
 add_parameter(p_list,'PARM_VIEW',text_parameter,'REJ');
 lnum_permission_yn := FUN_CHECK_PERMISSION(form_name,NULL,NULL,PCKG_GCNSTS.pnum_login_emp,PCKG_GCNSTS.pnum_set_of_book_id); --Form Name,Sub Function,Action is Passed
 IF lnum_permission_yn = 1 THEN
 OPEN_FORM(PATH,ACTIVATE,SESSION,SHARE_LIBRARY_DATA,P_LIST);
 ELSE
 MESSAGE('You don''t have permission to Run this Option. Please Contact your Administrator.');
 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE;
 END IF;
 ELSIF SUBSTR(LABEL_NAME,1,lnum_dash_pos-2)='Approved Vouchers Received' THEN
 p_list := get_parameter_list('p_list');
 
 IF NOT id_null(p_list) THEN
 destroy_parameter_list(p_list);
 END IF;
 
 p_list := create_parameter_list('p_list');
 add_parameter(p_list,'PARM_VIEW',text_parameter,'APP');
 lnum_permission_yn := FUN_CHECK_PERMISSION(form_name,NULL,NULL,PCKG_GCNSTS.pnum_login_emp,PCKG_GCNSTS.pnum_set_of_book_id); --Form Name,Sub Function,Action is Passed
 IF lnum_permission_yn = 1 THEN
 OPEN_FORM(PATH,ACTIVATE,SESSION,SHARE_LIBRARY_DATA,P_LIST);
 ELSE
 MESSAGE('You don''t have permission to Run this Option. Please Contact your Administrator.');
 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE;
 END IF;
 END IF;
 END IF;
---------------------------------Vouchers Authorization Systes End-----------------------------

---------------------CHECKING FOR JOURNAL NARRATION FORM-----------------------------------

 IF label_name = 'Journal Line Narration' THEN
 form_id:=FIND_FORM(form_name);
 IF NOT id_null(form_id) THEN
 GO_FORM(form_id);
 ELSE
 p_list := get_parameter_list('p_list');
 IF NOT id_null(p_list) THEN
 destroy_parameter_list(p_list);
 END IF;
 p_list := create_parameter_list('p_list');
 add_parameter(p_list,'MAST_QUERY_SOURCE',text_parameter,'JRN_LINE_DESC_MT');
 add_parameter(p_list,'DET_QUERY_SOURCE',text_parameter,'JRN_LINE_DESC_FIELDS a,FLEX_VALUE_SET_MT B');
 add_parameter(p_list,'WHERE_CLAUSE',text_parameter,'B.value_set_id=A.value_set_id');
 add_parameter(p_list,'DML_TARGET',text_parameter,'JRN_LINE_DESC_FIELDS A');
 add_parameter(p_list,'PARM_FORM_NAME',text_parameter,'JRN_LINE_DESC_MT');
 lnum_permission_yn := FUN_CHECK_PERMISSION(form_name,NULL,NULL,PCKG_GCNSTS.pnum_login_emp,PCKG_GCNSTS.pnum_set_of_book_id); --Form Name,Sub Function,Action is Passed
 IF lnum_permission_yn = 1 THEN
 OPEN_FORM(PATH,ACTIVATE,SESSION,SHARE_LIBRARY_DATA,P_LIST);
 ELSE
 MESSAGE('You don''t have permission to Run this Option. Please Contact your Administrator.');
 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE;
 END IF;
 END IF;

---------------------CHECKING FOR JOURNAL DESCRIPTION FORM----------------------------------- 

 ELSIF label_name = 'Journal Narration' THEN
 form_id:=FIND_FORM(form_name);
 IF NOT id_null(form_id) THEN
 GO_FORM(form_id);
 ELSE
 p_list := get_parameter_list('p_list');
 IF NOT id_null(p_list) THEN
 destroy_parameter_list(p_list);
 END IF;
 p_list := create_parameter_list('p_list');
 add_parameter(p_list,'MAST_QUERY_SOURCE',text_parameter,'JRN_MT_DESC_MT');
 add_parameter(p_list,'DET_QUERY_SOURCE',text_parameter,'JRN_MT_DESC_FIELDS a,FLEX_VALUE_SET_MT B');
 add_parameter(p_list,'WHERE_CLAUSE',text_parameter,'B.value_set_id=A.value_set_id');
 add_parameter(p_list,'DML_TARGET',text_parameter,'JRN_MT_DESC_FIELDS A');
 add_parameter(p_list,'PARM_FORM_NAME',text_parameter,'JRN_MT_DESC_MT');
 lnum_permission_yn := FUN_CHECK_PERMISSION(form_name,NULL,NULL,PCKG_GCNSTS.pnum_login_emp,PCKG_GCNSTS.pnum_set_of_book_id); --Form Name,Sub Function,Action is Passed
 IF lnum_permission_yn = 1 THEN
 OPEN_FORM(PATH,ACTIVATE,SESSION,SHARE_LIBRARY_DATA,P_LIST);
 ELSE
 MESSAGE('You don''t have permission to Run this Option. Please Contact your Administrator.');
 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE;
 END IF; 
 END IF;
 END IF;
--------------------------------CHECKING FOR JOURNAL FORM-----------------------------------
 p_label_name:=label_name;
 lnod_node_parent := FTREE.GET_TREE_NODE_PARENT('MENU',N_NAME);
 label_name:=FTREE.GET_TREE_NODE_PROPERTY('MENU',lnod_node_parent,FTREE.NODE_LABEL);
 IF label_name IN('Journals','Encumbrance') AND p_label_name<>'Define Batch' AND p_label_name<>'Encumbrance Type' THEN
 plst_id := GET_PARAMETER_LIST('plst_form_params');
 IF ID_NULL(plst_id) THEN
 plst_id := CREATE_PARAMETER_LIST('plst_form_params');
 ELSE
 DESTROY_PARAMETER_LIST(plst_id); 
 plst_id := CREATE_PARAMETER_LIST('plst_form_params');
 END IF;
 form_id:=FIND_FORM(form_name);
 
 IF NOT id_null(form_id) THEN
 GO_FORM(form_id);
 ELSE
 IF label_name=('Journals') THEN
 ADD_PARAMETER(plst_id,'PARM_MENU_BUTTON',TEXT_PARAMETER,'J');
 lnum_permission_yn := FUN_CHECK_PERMISSION('FRM_JOURNAL',NULL,NULL,PCKG_GCNSTS.pnum_login_emp,PCKG_GCNSTS.pnum_set_of_book_id); --Form Name,Sub Function,Action is Passed
 IF lnum_permission_yn = 1 THEN
 OPEN_FORM(PATH,ACTIVATE,SESSION,SHARE_LIBRARY_DATA,plst_id);
 ELSE
 MESSAGE('You don''t have permission to Run this Option. Please Contact your Administrator.');
 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE;
 END IF; 
 ELSIF label_name=('Encumbrance') THEN
 ADD_PARAMETER(plst_id,'PARM_MENU_BUTTON',TEXT_PARAMETER,'E');
 lnum_permission_yn := FUN_CHECK_PERMISSION('FRM_JOURNAL1',NULL,NULL,PCKG_GCNSTS.pnum_login_emp,PCKG_GCNSTS.pnum_set_of_book_id); --Form Name,Sub Function,Action is Passed
 IF lnum_permission_yn = 1 THEN
 OPEN_FORM(PATH,ACTIVATE,SESSION,SHARE_LIBRARY_DATA,plst_id);
 ELSE
 MESSAGE('You don''t have permission to Run this Option. Please Contact your Administrator.');
 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE;
 END IF; 
 END IF;
 END IF;
----------------------------------------IF OTHER FORMS------------------------------------- 
 ELSE
 form_id:=FIND_FORM(form_name);
 IF NOT id_null(form_id) THEN
 GO_FORM(form_id);
 ELSE
 label_name:=FTREE.GET_TREE_NODE_PROPERTY('MENU',N_NAME,FTREE.NODE_LABEL);
 lnum_permission_yn := FUN_CHECK_PERMISSION(form_name,NULL,NULL,PCKG_GCNSTS.pnum_login_emp,PCKG_GCNSTS.pnum_set_of_book_id); --Form Name,Sub Function,Action is Passed
 IF lnum_permission_yn = 1 THEN
 --lnum_node_id := FTREE.GET_TREE_NODE_PROPERTY('MENU',N_NAME,FTREE.NODE_VALUE);
 /*BEGIN
 SELECT MENU_PARAMETERS INTO lvch_parameters
 FROM WIZMENU_ERP
 WHERE NODE_ID = lnum_node_id;
 AND NODE_NAME LIKE '%'||label_name||'%';
 EXCEPTION
 WHEN NO_DATA_FOUND THEN
 lvch_parameters := NULL;
 END;*/
 IF (lvch_parameters IS NOT NULL) THEN
 plst_id := GET_PARM_LIST(lvch_parameters);
 OPEN_FORM(PATH,ACTIVATE,SESSION,SHARE_LIBRARY_DATA,plst_id);
 ELSE
 OPEN_FORM(PATH,ACTIVATE,SESSION,SHARE_LIBRARY_DATA);
 END IF;
 ELSE
 MESSAGE('You don''t have permission to Run this Option. Please Contact your Administrator.');
 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE;
 END IF;
 END IF;
 END IF;
---------------------------------------IF REPORT WITH PATH-----------------------------------
 ELSIF SUBSTR(PATH_R,LENGTH(PATH_R)-2)='REP' OR SUBSTR(PATH_R,LENGTH(PATH_R)-2)='rep' THEN
 RUN_PRODUCT(REPORTS,PATH,ASYNCHRONOUS,RUNTIME,FILESYSTEM,'');
 
 /********* abid *****************************/
 --message('Criteria Forms Called ');
 ELSIF UPPER(SUBSTR(PATH_R,LENGTH(PATH_R)-2))='CRT' THEN 
 Clear_message;
 BEGIN
 lvch_val_length:=FTREE.GET_TREE_NODE_PROPERTY('MENU',:SYSTEM.TRIGGER_NODE,FTREE.NODE_VALUE);
 BEGIN
 SELECT NODE_PATH INTO lvch_val_length
 FROM WIZMENU_ERP 
 WHERE NODE_ID = lvch_val_length;
 END;
 --open clm_returen(FTREE.GET_TREE_NODE_PROPERTY('MENU',:SYSTEM.TRIGGER_NODE,FTREE.NODE_VALUE));
 open clm_returen(SUBSTR(lvch_val_length,1,LENGTH(lvch_val_length)-4));
 FETCH clm_returen INTO LRTYPE_RPT_DEF;
 if clm_returen%notfound then
 message('Values are not set in Definition Table');
 end if; 
 close clm_returen;
 EXCEPTION
 WHEN NO_DATA_FOUND THEN
 MESSAGE('No data found');
 WHEN OTHERS THEN
 MESSAGE('Values are not set in Report Definition Table');
 MESSAGE(' text '||dbms_error_text); 
 END;
 IF LRTYPE_RPT_DEF.TABLE_NAME IS NOT NULL THEN
 RPT_PATH := 'D:\Projects\Wizerp\REPORT\'||LRTYPE_RPT_DEF.RPT_NAME;
 --message('table name is '||FTREE.GET_TREE_NODE_PROPERTY('MENU',:SYSTEM.TRIGGER_NODE,FTREE.NODE_VALUE));
 RPT_NAME := SUBSTR(LRTYPE_RPT_DEF.RPT_CMP_CHEADING_CNAME,0,FUN_INSTR(LRTYPE_RPT_DEF.RPT_CMP_CHEADING_CNAME,',',1,1)-1 );
 CMP_NAME := SUBSTR(LRTYPE_RPT_DEF.RPT_CMP_CHEADING_CNAME,
 FUN_INSTR(LRTYPE_RPT_DEF.RPT_CMP_CHEADING_CNAME,',',1,1)+1,
 FUN_INSTR(LRTYPE_RPT_DEF.RPT_CMP_CHEADING_CNAME,',',2,1)-FUN_INSTR(LRTYPE_RPT_DEF.RPT_CMP_CHEADING_CNAME,',',1,1)-1 );
 FIRST_CLM_NAME := SUBSTR(LRTYPE_RPT_DEF.RPT_CMP_CHEADING_CNAME,
 FUN_INSTR(LRTYPE_RPT_DEF.RPT_CMP_CHEADING_CNAME,',',2,1)+1,
 FUN_INSTR(LRTYPE_RPT_DEF.RPT_CMP_CHEADING_CNAME,',',3,1)-
 FUN_INSTR(LRTYPE_RPT_DEF.RPT_CMP_CHEADING_CNAME,',',2,1)-1);
 SECOND_CLM_NAME := SUBSTR(LRTYPE_RPT_DEF.RPT_CMP_CHEADING_CNAME,
 FUN_INSTR(LRTYPE_RPT_DEF.RPT_CMP_CHEADING_CNAME,',',3,1)+1,
 FUN_INSTR(LRTYPE_RPT_DEF.RPT_CMP_CHEADING_CNAME,',',4,1)-
 FUN_INSTR(LRTYPE_RPT_DEF.RPT_CMP_CHEADING_CNAME,',',3,1)-1);
 THIRD_CLM_NAME := SUBSTR(LRTYPE_RPT_DEF.RPT_CMP_CHEADING_CNAME,
 FUN_INSTR(LRTYPE_RPT_DEF.RPT_CMP_CHEADING_CNAME,',',4,1)+1,
 FUN_INSTR(LRTYPE_RPT_DEF.RPT_CMP_CHEADING_CNAME,',',5,1)-
 FUN_INSTR(LRTYPE_RPT_DEF.RPT_CMP_CHEADING_CNAME,',',4,1)-1);
 FOURTH_CLM_NAME := SUBSTR(LRTYPE_RPT_DEF.RPT_CMP_CHEADING_CNAME,
 FUN_INSTR(LRTYPE_RPT_DEF.RPT_CMP_CHEADING_CNAME,',',5,1)+1,
 FUN_INSTR(LRTYPE_RPT_DEF.RPT_CMP_CHEADING_CNAME,',',6,1)-
 FUN_INSTR(LRTYPE_RPT_DEF.RPT_CMP_CHEADING_CNAME,',',5,1)-1);
 FIFTH_CLM_NAME := SUBSTR(LRTYPE_RPT_DEF.RPT_CMP_CHEADING_CNAME,
 FUN_INSTR(LRTYPE_RPT_DEF.RPT_CMP_CHEADING_CNAME,',',6,1)+1,
 FUN_INSTR(LRTYPE_RPT_DEF.RPT_CMP_CHEADING_CNAME,',',7,1)-
 FUN_INSTR(LRTYPE_RPT_DEF.RPT_CMP_CHEADING_CNAME,',',6,1)-1);
 SIXTH_CLM_NAME := SUBSTR(LRTYPE_RPT_DEF.RPT_CMP_CHEADING_CNAME,
 FUN_INSTR(LRTYPE_RPT_DEF.RPT_CMP_CHEADING_CNAME,',',7,1)+1,
 FUN_INSTR(LRTYPE_RPT_DEF.RPT_CMP_CHEADING_CNAME,',',8,1)-
 FUN_INSTR(LRTYPE_RPT_DEF.RPT_CMP_CHEADING_CNAME,',',7,1)-1);
 SEVENTH_CLM_NAME := SUBSTR(LRTYPE_RPT_DEF.RPT_CMP_CHEADING_CNAME,
 FUN_INSTR(LRTYPE_RPT_DEF.RPT_CMP_CHEADING_CNAME,',',8,1)+1,
 FUN_INSTR(LRTYPE_RPT_DEF.RPT_CMP_CHEADING_CNAME,',',9,1)-
 FUN_INSTR(LRTYPE_RPT_DEF.RPT_CMP_CHEADING_CNAME,',',8,1)-1 );
 
 EIGHTH_CLM_NAME := SUBSTR(LRTYPE_RPT_DEF.RPT_CMP_CHEADING_CNAME,
 FUN_INSTR(LRTYPE_RPT_DEF.RPT_CMP_CHEADING_CNAME,',',9,1)+1,
 FUN_INSTR(LRTYPE_RPT_DEF.RPT_CMP_CHEADING_CNAME,',',10,1)-
 FUN_INSTR(LRTYPE_RPT_DEF.RPT_CMP_CHEADING_CNAME,',',9,1)-1 );
 
 NINTH_CLM_NAME := SUBSTR(LRTYPE_RPT_DEF.RPT_CMP_CHEADING_CNAME,
 FUN_INSTR(LRTYPE_RPT_DEF.RPT_CMP_CHEADING_CNAME,',',10,1)+1,
 FUN_INSTR(LRTYPE_RPT_DEF.RPT_CMP_CHEADING_CNAME,',',11,1)-
 FUN_INSTR(LRTYPE_RPT_DEF.RPT_CMP_CHEADING_CNAME,',',10,1)-1 );
 
 TENTH_CLM_NAME := SUBSTR(LRTYPE_RPT_DEF.RPT_CMP_CHEADING_CNAME,
 FUN_INSTR(LRTYPE_RPT_DEF.RPT_CMP_CHEADING_CNAME,',',11,1)+1,
 FUN_INSTR(LRTYPE_RPT_DEF.RPT_CMP_CHEADING_CNAME,',',12,1)-
 FUN_INSTR(LRTYPE_RPT_DEF.RPT_CMP_CHEADING_CNAME,',',11,1)-1 );
 
 
 
 IF LRTYPE_RPT_DEF.RPT_NAME='WIZ_REP_1COL.rep' THEN frm_name := 'CRT_1COL';
 ELSIF LRTYPE_RPT_DEF.RPT_NAME='WIZ_REP_2COL.rep' THEN frm_name := 'CRT_2COL';
 ELSIF LRTYPE_RPT_DEF.RPT_NAME='WIZ_REP_3COL.rep' THEN frm_name := 'CRT_3COL';
 ELSIF LRTYPE_RPT_DEF.RPT_NAME='WIZ_REP_4COL.rep' THEN frm_name := 'CRT_4COL';
 ELSIF LRTYPE_RPT_DEF.RPT_NAME='WIZ_REP_5COL.rep' THEN frm_name := 'CRT_5COL';
 ELSIF LRTYPE_RPT_DEF.RPT_NAME='WIZ_REP_6COL.rep' THEN frm_name := 'CRT_6COL';
 ELSIF LRTYPE_RPT_DEF.RPT_NAME='WIZ_REP_7COL.rep' THEN frm_name := 'CRT_7COL';
 ELSIF LRTYPE_RPT_DEF.RPT_NAME='WIZ_REP_8COL.rep' THEN frm_name := 'CRT_8COL';
 ELSIF LRTYPE_RPT_DEF.RPT_NAME='WIZ_REP_9COL.rep' THEN frm_name := 'CRT_9COL';
 ELSIF LRTYPE_RPT_DEF.RPT_NAME='WIZ_REP_10COL.rep'THEN frm_name := 'CRT_10COL';
 
 END IF;
 plst_id := GET_PARAMETER_LIST('plst_form_params');
 IF ID_NULL(plst_id) THEN
 plst_id := CREATE_PARAMETER_LIST('plst_form_params');
 ELSE
 DESTROY_PARAMETER_LIST(plst_id); 
 plst_id := CREATE_PARAMETER_LIST('plst_form_params');
 END IF;
 ADD_PARAMETER(plst_id,'Parm_query',TEXT_PARAMETER,LRTYPE_RPT_DEF.RPT_QUERY);
 ADD_PARAMETER(plst_id,'PARM_APP_NAME',TEXT_PARAMETER,'WIZERP');
 ADD_PARAMETER(plst_id,'PARM_rep_NAME',TEXT_PARAMETER,RPT_NAME);
 ADD_PARAMETER(plst_id,'PARM_co_NAME',TEXT_PARAMETER,CMP_NAME);
 ADD_PARAMETER(plst_id,'PARM_LIST_VALUES',TEXT_PARAMETER,LRTYPE_RPT_DEF.LIST_VALUES);
 ADD_PARAMETER(plst_id,'PARM_REP_SOURCE',TEXT_PARAMETER,LRTYPE_RPT_DEF.RPT_NAME);
 ADD_PARAMETER(plst_id,'PARM_FORM_NAME',TEXT_PARAMETER,
 FTREE.GET_TREE_NODE_PROPERTY('MENU',:SYSTEM.TRIGGER_NODE,FTREE.NODE_LABEL));
 ADD_PARAMETER(plst_id,'PARM_TABLE',TEXT_PARAMETER,LRTYPE_RPT_DEF.TABLE_NAME);
 /*ADD_PARAMETER(plst_id,'PARM_FIRST_CLM_DESC',TEXT_PARAMETER,SUBSTR(FIRST_CLM_NAME,1,
 FUN_INSTR(FIRST_CLM_NAME,' ',1,1)));*/
 IF FIRST_CLM_NAME IS NOT NULL THEN
 ADD_PARAMETER(plst_id,'PARM_FIRST_CLM_DESC',TEXT_PARAMETER,FIRST_CLM_NAME);
 ADD_PARAMETER(plst_id,'PARM_FIRST_CLM_NAME',TEXT_PARAMETER,FIRST_CLM_NAME);
 END IF;
 IF SECOND_CLM_NAME IS NOT NULL THEN
 ADD_PARAMETER(plst_id,'PARM_SECOND_CLM_NAME',TEXT_PARAMETER,SECOND_CLM_NAME);
 ADD_PARAMETER(plst_id,'PARM_SECOND_CLM_DESC',TEXT_PARAMETER,SECOND_CLM_NAME);
 /*ADD_PARAMETER(plst_id,'PARM_SECOND_CLM_DESC',TEXT_PARAMETER,SUBSTR(SECOND_CLM_NAME,1,
 FUN_INSTR(SECOND_CLM_NAME,' ',1,1)));*/
 END IF;
 IF THIRD_CLM_NAME IS NOT NULL THEN
 ADD_PARAMETER(plst_id,'PARM_THIRD_CLM_NAME',TEXT_PARAMETER,THIRD_CLM_NAME);
 ADD_PARAMETER(plst_id,'PARM_THIRD_CLM_DESC',TEXT_PARAMETER,THIRD_CLM_NAME);

 IF EIGHTH_CLM_NAME IS NOT NULL THEN

 ADD_PARAMETER(plst_id,'PARM_EIGHTH_CLM_DESC',TEXT_PARAMETER,EIGHTH_CLM_NAME );
 END IF;
 IF NINTH_CLM_NAME IS NOT NULL THEN

 ADD_PARAMETER(plst_id,'PARM_NINTH_CLM_NAME',TEXT_PARAMETER,NINTH_CLM_NAME );

 IF TENTH_CLM_NAME IS NOT NULL THEN

 ADD_PARAMETER(plst_id,'PARM_TENTH_CLM_NAME',TEXT_PARAMETER,TENTH_CLM_NAME );

 --ADD_PARAMETER(plst_id,'paramform',TEXT_PARAMETER,'NO'); 
 --RUN_PRODUCT(REPORTS,RPT_PATH,ASYNCHRONOUS,RUNTIME,FILESYSTEM,plst_id,null);
 --OPEN_FORM('D:\Projects\Wizerp\Forms\Criteria forms\'||frm_name ,ACTIVATE,SESSION,SHARE_LIBRARY_DATA,plst_id); 
 --CALL_FORM('D:\Projects\Wizerp\Forms\Criteria forms\'||frm_name,HIDE,NO_REPLACE,NO_QUERY_ONLY,plst_id); 
 --CALL_FORM('D:\Projects\Wizerp\Forms\Criteria forms\'||frm_name,NO_HIDE,NO_REPLACE,NO_QUERY_ONLY,plst_id); 
 CALL_FORM(frm_name,NO_HIDE,NO_REPLACE,NO_QUERY_ONLY,plst_id); 
 END IF;
 /* ELSE
 RUN_PRODUCT(REPORTS,PATH_R,ASYNCHRONOUS,RUNTIME,FILESYSTEM,'');
 END IF;*/

 
 
 
 /************* abid *********************************/


--------------------------------ELSE CHECKING FOR SEGMENT VALUES-----------------------------
 ELSE
 lnod_node_parent := FTREE.GET_TREE_NODE_PARENT('MENU',N_NAME);
 label_name:=FTREE.GET_TREE_NODE_PROPERTY('MENU',lnod_node_parent,FTREE.NODE_LABEL);
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 IF label_name = 'Segment Values'

 THEN

 --ADD_PARAMETER(plst_id,'parm_table_name',TEXT_PARAMETER,'VIEW_WIZ_SEGMENT02');
 ADD_PARAMETER(plst_id,'parm_table_name',TEXT_PARAMETER,PATH);
 ADD_PARAMETER(plst_id,'parm_struc_id',TEXT_PARAMETER,:PARAMETER.PARM_STRUC_ID);
 IF label_name='Segment Values' THEN

 IF NOT id_null(form_id) THEN

 ELSE

 END IF; 
 
 END IF;
 ELSIF label_name='Segment Listings' THEN
 form_id:=FIND_FORM('FORM_SEGMENT_LISTING');
 IF NOT id_null(form_id) THEN

Trigger.Name: WHEN-TREE-NODE-SELECTED
Trigger.TriggerText:
DECLARE
 N_NAME FTREE.NODE;
 PATH VARCHAR2(500);
 mi_id MenuItem; 
 val VARCHAR2(10); 
 P_label_name VARCHAR2(100);
 LABEL_FAV VARCHAR2(100);
 label_name VARCHAR2(100);
 lnod_node_parent FTREE.NODE;
BEGIN

 LABEL_FAV:='';
 
 N_NAME:=:SYSTEM.TRIGGER_NODE;
 
 lnod_node_parent := FTREE.GET_TREE_NODE_PARENT('MENU',:SYSTEM.TRIGGER_NODE);
 P_label_name:=FTREE.GET_TREE_NODE_PROPERTY('MENU',lnod_node_parent,FTREE.NODE_LABEL);
 
 IF UPPER(P_label_name)='SEGMENT VALUES' THEN 
 PATH:=FTREE.GET_TREE_NODE_PROPERTY('MENU',N_NAME,FTREE.NODE_VALUE);
 label_name:=FTREE.GET_TREE_NODE_PROPERTY('MENU',N_NAME,FTREE.NODE_LABEL);
 label_name:=label_name||'\frm';
 
 ELSIF UPPER(P_label_name)='SEGMENT LISTINGS' THEN 
 PATH:=FTREE.GET_TREE_NODE_PROPERTY('MENU',N_NAME,FTREE.NODE_VALUE);
 label_name:=FTREE.GET_TREE_NODE_PROPERTY('MENU',N_NAME,FTREE.NODE_LABEL);
 label_name:=label_name||'\rep';
 ELSIF P_label_name='Authorization' THEN 
 mi_id := Find_Menu_Item('POPUP_MENU.ADD_TO_FAVOURITES');
 Set_Menu_Item_Property(mi_id,ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 ELSE
 PATH:=FTREE.GET_TREE_NODE_PROPERTY('MENU',N_NAME,FTREE.NODE_VALUE);
 label_name:=FTREE.GET_TREE_NODE_PROPERTY('MENU',N_NAME,FTREE.NODE_LABEL);
 
 END IF;
 
 SELECT NODE_NAME INTO LABEL_FAV FROM WIZMENU_FAVOURIT_ERP WHERE NODE_NAME=label_name;
 
 IF LABEL_FAV IS NOT NULL THEN
 mi_id := Find_Menu_Item('POPUP_MENU.ADD_TO_FAVOURITES');
 Set_Menu_Item_Property(mi_id,ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 END IF;
 
EXCEPTION 
 
 WHEN NO_DATA_FOUND THEN
 IF PATH IS NULL THEN
 mi_id := Find_Menu_Item('POPUP_MENU.ADD_TO_FAVOURITES');
 Set_Menu_Item_Property(mi_id,ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 ELSE
 mi_id := Find_Menu_Item('POPUP_MENU.ADD_TO_FAVOURITES');
 Set_Menu_Item_Property(mi_id,ENABLED,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 END IF;
END;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-LIST-ACTIVATED
Trigger.TriggerText:
DECLARE
 --N_NAME FTREE.NODE;
 N_NAME VARCHAR2(100);
 PATH VARCHAR2(500);
 PATH_R VARCHAR2(300);
 A NUMBER;
 lnod_node_parent FTREE.NODE;
 plst_id PARAMLIST; 
 p_list PARAMLIST;
 label_name VARCHAR2(100);
 form_name VARCHAR2(100);
 form_id FORMMODULE;
 find_node FTREE.NODE;
 htree ITEM;
 P_find_node FTREE.NODE;
 lent NUMBER;
 
 /*********abid*************/
 
 lvch_val_length VARCHAR2(100);
 cursor clm_returen(parm_tbl_name varchar2) is SELECT * FROM WIZ_REPORT_DEFINITION
 WHERE UPPER(TABLE_NAME)= UPPER(parm_tbl_name);
 LRTYPE_RPT_DEF WIZ_REPORT_DEFINITION%ROWTYPE;
 RPT_PATH VARCHAR2(1000);
 
 CMP_NAME VARCHAR2(50);
 FIRST_CLM_NAME VARCHAR2(50); SECOND_CLM_NAME VARCHAR2(50); THIRD_CLM_NAME VARCHAR2(50);
 FOURTH_CLM_NAME VARCHAR2(50); FIFTH_CLM_NAME VARCHAR2(50); SIXTH_CLM_NAME vARCHAR2(50);
 SEVENTH_CLM_NAME VARCHAR2(50); EIGHT_CLM_NAME VARCHAR2(50); NINTH_CLM_NAME VARCHAR2(50);
 TENTH_CLM_NAME VARCHAR2(50);
 lnum_loc NUMBER(3);
 TBL_NAME VARCHAR2(100);--:= FTREE.GET_TREE_NODE_PROPERTY('MENU',:SYSTEM.TRIGGER_NODE,FTREE.NODE_VALUE);
 
 frm_name VARCHAR2(100);
 RPT_NAME VARCHAR2(50);

 
 /*********abid*************/
 
BEGIN
 
 htree := Find_Item('TREE_BLOCK.MENU');

 
 N_NAME := :LIST_NODE_NAME;
 
 IF UPPER(SUBSTR(N_NAME,-15))='SEGMENT LISTING' THEN
 lent:=length(N_NAME);
 N_NAME:=SUBSTR(N_NAME,1,lent-16);
 N_NAME:=N_NAME||'\rep';
 ELSIf UPPER(SUBSTR(N_NAME,-14))='SEGMENT VALUES' THEN
 lent:=length(N_NAME);
 N_NAME:=SUBSTR(N_NAME,1,lent-15);
 N_NAME:=N_NAME||'\frm';
 END IF; 
 
 SELECT NODE_PATH INTO PATH FROM WIZMENU_ERP WHERE NODE_NAME=N_NAME;
 --PATH := FTREE.GET_TREE_NODE_PROPERTY('MENU',N_NAME,FTREE.NODE_VALUE);
 A:=INSTR(PATH,'\',-1);
 PATH_R:=SUBSTR(PATH,A+1); 
 
-------------------------------------IF PATH IS NULL---------------------------------------

 IF PATH IS NULL THEN
 --MESSAGE('NO DETAIL AVAILABLE!',NO_ACKNOWLEDGE);
 NULL;
-------------------------------------PATH IS NOT NULL--------------------------------------

 ELSE 
 form_name:=substr(path_r,1,length(path_r)-4);
 
-------------------------------------CHECK IF CHK_PATH IS 1-------------------------------- 

 IF :CHK_PATH=1 THEN

-------------------------------------IF FILE EXT IS FMX------------------------------------ 

 IF SUBSTR(PATH_R,LENGTH(PATH_R)-2)='FMX' OR SUBSTR(PATH_R,LENGTH(PATH_R)-2)='fmx' THEN
 --label_name:=FTREE.GET_TREE_NODE_PROPERTY('MENU',N_NAME,FTREE.NODE_LABEL);
 label_name:=:LIST_NODE_NAME;
 
---------------------CHECKING FOR JOURNAL NARRATION FORM-----------------------------------
 IF label_name = 'Journal Narration' THEN
 form_id:=FIND_FORM(form_name);
 IF NOT id_null(form_id) THEN
 GO_FORM(form_id);
 ELSE
 p_list := get_parameter_list('p_list');
 IF NOT id_null(p_list) THEN
 destroy_parameter_list(p_list);
 END IF;
 p_list := create_parameter_list('p_list');
 add_parameter(p_list,'MAST_QUERY_SOURCE',text_parameter,'JRN_LINE_DESC_MT');
 add_parameter(p_list,'DET_QUERY_SOURCE',text_parameter,'JRN_LINE_DESC_FIELDS a,FLEX_VALUE_SET_MT B');
 add_parameter(p_list,'WHERE_CLAUSE',text_parameter,'B.value_set_id=A.value_set_id');
 add_parameter(p_list,'DML_TARGET',text_parameter,'JRN_LINE_DESC_FIELDS A');
 add_parameter(p_list,'PARM_FORM_NAME',text_parameter,'JRN_LINE_DESC_MT');
 OPEN_FORM(PATH,ACTIVATE,SESSION,SHARE_LIBRARY_DATA,P_LIST);
 END IF;

---------------------CHECKING FOR JOURNAL DESCRIPTION FORM----------------------------------- 

 ELSIF label_name = 'Journal Description' THEN
 form_id:=FIND_FORM(form_name);
 IF NOT id_null(form_id) THEN
 GO_FORM(form_id);
 ELSE
 p_list := get_parameter_list('p_list');
 IF NOT id_null(p_list) THEN
 destroy_parameter_list(p_list);
 END IF;
 p_list := create_parameter_list('p_list');
 add_parameter(p_list,'MAST_QUERY_SOURCE',text_parameter,'JRN_MT_DESC_MT');
 add_parameter(p_list,'DET_QUERY_SOURCE',text_parameter,'JRN_MT_DESC_FIELDS a,FLEX_VALUE_SET_MT B');
 add_parameter(p_list,'WHERE_CLAUSE',text_parameter,'B.value_set_id=A.value_set_id');
 add_parameter(p_list,'DML_TARGET',text_parameter,'JRN_MT_DESC_FIELDS A');
 add_parameter(p_list,'PARM_FORM_NAME',text_parameter,'JRN_MT_DESC_MT');
 OPEN_FORM(PATH,ACTIVATE,SESSION,SHARE_LIBRARY_DATA,P_LIST);
 END IF;
 END IF;
--------------------------------CHECKING FOR JOURNAL FORM-----------------------------------
 IF label_name IN('Journal','Encumbrance Journal') THEN
 plst_id := GET_PARAMETER_LIST('plst_form_params');
 IF ID_NULL(plst_id) THEN
 plst_id := CREATE_PARAMETER_LIST('plst_form_params');
 ELSE
 DESTROY_PARAMETER_LIST(plst_id); 
 plst_id := CREATE_PARAMETER_LIST('plst_form_params');
 END IF;
 form_id:=FIND_FORM(form_name);
 
 IF NOT id_null(form_id) THEN
 GO_FORM(form_id);
 ELSE
 IF label_name=('Journal') THEN
 ADD_PARAMETER(plst_id,'PARM_MENU_BUTTON',TEXT_PARAMETER,'J');
 OPEN_FORM(PATH,ACTIVATE,SESSION,SHARE_LIBRARY_DATA,plst_id);
 ELSE
 ADD_PARAMETER(plst_id,'PARM_MENU_BUTTON',TEXT_PARAMETER,'E');
 OPEN_FORM(PATH,ACTIVATE,SESSION,SHARE_LIBRARY_DATA,plst_id);
 END IF;
 END IF;
----------------------------------------IF OTHER FORMS------------------------------------- 
 ELSE
 form_id:=FIND_FORM(form_name);
 IF NOT id_null(form_id) THEN
 GO_FORM(form_id);
 ELSE
 OPEN_FORM(PATH,ACTIVATE,SESSION,SHARE_LIBRARY_DATA);
 END IF;
 END IF;
 
 
---------------------------------------IF REPORT WITH PATH-----------------------------------
 ELSIF SUBSTR(PATH_R,LENGTH(PATH_R)-2)='REP' OR SUBSTR(PATH_R,LENGTH(PATH_R)-2)='rep' THEN
 RUN_PRODUCT(REPORTS,PATH,ASYNCHRONOUS,RUNTIME,FILESYSTEM,'');
 /********* abid *****************************/
 --message('Criteria Forms Called ');
 ELSIF UPPER(SUBSTR(PATH_R,LENGTH(PATH_R)-2))='CRT' THEN 
 Clear_message;
 BEGIN
 lvch_val_length:=FTREE.GET_TREE_NODE_PROPERTY('MENU',:SYSTEM.TRIGGER_NODE,FTREE.NODE_VALUE);
 --open clm_returen(FTREE.GET_TREE_NODE_PROPERTY('MENU',:SYSTEM.TRIGGER_NODE,FTREE.NODE_VALUE));
 open clm_returen(SUBSTR(lvch_val_length,1,LENGTH(lvch_val_length)-4));
 FETCH clm_returen INTO LRTYPE_RPT_DEF;
 if clm_returen%notfound then
 message('Values are not set in Definition Table');
 end if; 
 close clm_returen;
 EXCEPTION
 WHEN NO_DATA_FOUND THEN
 MESSAGE('No data found');
 WHEN OTHERS THEN
 MESSAGE('Values are not set in Report Definition Table');
 MESSAGE(' text '||dbms_error_text); 
 END;
 IF LRTYPE_RPT_DEF.TABLE_NAME IS NOT NULL THEN
 RPT_PATH := 'D:\Projects\Wizerp\REPORT\'||LRTYPE_RPT_DEF.RPT_NAME;
 --message('table name is '||FTREE.GET_TREE_NODE_PROPERTY('MENU',:SYSTEM.TRIGGER_NODE,FTREE.NODE_VALUE));

 CMP_NAME := SUBSTR(LRTYPE_RPT_DEF.RPT_CMP_CHEADING_CNAME,
 FUN_INSTR(LRTYPE_RPT_DEF.RPT_CMP_CHEADING_CNAME,',',1,1)+1,
 FUN_INSTR(LRTYPE_RPT_DEF.RPT_CMP_CHEADING_CNAME,',',2,1)-FUN_INSTR(LRTYPE_RPT_DEF.RPT_CMP_CHEADING_CNAME,',',1,1)-1 );
 FIRST_CLM_NAME := SUBSTR(LRTYPE_RPT_DEF.RPT_CMP_CHEADING_CNAME,
 FUN_INSTR(LRTYPE_RPT_DEF.RPT_CMP_CHEADING_CNAME,',',2,1)+1,
 FUN_INSTR(LRTYPE_RPT_DEF.RPT_CMP_CHEADING_CNAME,',',3,1)-
 FUN_INSTR(LRTYPE_RPT_DEF.RPT_CMP_CHEADING_CNAME,',',2,1)-1);
 SECOND_CLM_NAME := SUBSTR(LRTYPE_RPT_DEF.RPT_CMP_CHEADING_CNAME,
 FUN_INSTR(LRTYPE_RPT_DEF.RPT_CMP_CHEADING_CNAME,',',3,1)+1,
 FUN_INSTR(LRTYPE_RPT_DEF.RPT_CMP_CHEADING_CNAME,',',4,1)-
 FUN_INSTR(LRTYPE_RPT_DEF.RPT_CMP_CHEADING_CNAME,',',3,1)-1);
 THIRD_CLM_NAME := SUBSTR(LRTYPE_RPT_DEF.RPT_CMP_CHEADING_CNAME,
 FUN_INSTR(LRTYPE_RPT_DEF.RPT_CMP_CHEADING_CNAME,',',4,1)+1,
 FUN_INSTR(LRTYPE_RPT_DEF.RPT_CMP_CHEADING_CNAME,',',5,1)-
 FUN_INSTR(LRTYPE_RPT_DEF.RPT_CMP_CHEADING_CNAME,',',4,1)-1);
 FOURTH_CLM_NAME := SUBSTR(LRTYPE_RPT_DEF.RPT_CMP_CHEADING_CNAME,
 FUN_INSTR(LRTYPE_RPT_DEF.RPT_CMP_CHEADING_CNAME,',',5,1)+1,
 FUN_INSTR(LRTYPE_RPT_DEF.RPT_CMP_CHEADING_CNAME,',',6,1)-
 FUN_INSTR(LRTYPE_RPT_DEF.RPT_CMP_CHEADING_CNAME,',',5,1)-1);
 FIFTH_CLM_NAME := SUBSTR(LRTYPE_RPT_DEF.RPT_CMP_CHEADING_CNAME,
 FUN_INSTR(LRTYPE_RPT_DEF.RPT_CMP_CHEADING_CNAME,',',6,1)+1,
 FUN_INSTR(LRTYPE_RPT_DEF.RPT_CMP_CHEADING_CNAME,',',7,1)-
 FUN_INSTR(LRTYPE_RPT_DEF.RPT_CMP_CHEADING_CNAME,',',6,1)-1);
 SIXTH_CLM_NAME := SUBSTR(LRTYPE_RPT_DEF.RPT_CMP_CHEADING_CNAME,
 FUN_INSTR(LRTYPE_RPT_DEF.RPT_CMP_CHEADING_CNAME,',',7,1)+1,
 FUN_INSTR(LRTYPE_RPT_DEF.RPT_CMP_CHEADING_CNAME,',',8,1)-
 FUN_INSTR(LRTYPE_RPT_DEF.RPT_CMP_CHEADING_CNAME,',',7,1)-1);
 SEVENTH_CLM_NAME := SUBSTR(LRTYPE_RPT_DEF.RPT_CMP_CHEADING_CNAME,
 FUN_INSTR(LRTYPE_RPT_DEF.RPT_CMP_CHEADING_CNAME,',',8,1)+1,
 FUN_INSTR(LRTYPE_RPT_DEF.RPT_CMP_CHEADING_CNAME,',',9,1)-
 FUN_INSTR(LRTYPE_RPT_DEF.RPT_CMP_CHEADING_CNAME,',',8,1)-1 );
 IF LRTYPE_RPT_DEF.RPT_NAME='WIZ_REP_1COL.rep' THEN frm_name := 'CRT_1COL';
 ELSIF LRTYPE_RPT_DEF.RPT_NAME='WIZ_REP_2COL.rep' THEN frm_name := 'CRT_2COL';
 ELSIF LRTYPE_RPT_DEF.RPT_NAME='WIZ_REP_3COL.rep' THEN frm_name := 'CRT_3COL';
 ELSIF LRTYPE_RPT_DEF.RPT_NAME='WIZ_REP_4COL.rep' THEN frm_name := 'CRT_4COL';
 ELSIF LRTYPE_RPT_DEF.RPT_NAME='WIZ_REP_5COL.rep' THEN frm_name := 'CRT_5COL';
 ELSIF LRTYPE_RPT_DEF.RPT_NAME='WIZ_REP_6COL.rep' THEN frm_name := 'CRT_6COL';
 END IF;
 plst_id := GET_PARAMETER_LIST('plst_form_params');
 IF ID_NULL(plst_id) THEN
 plst_id := CREATE_PARAMETER_LIST('plst_form_params');
 ELSE
 DESTROY_PARAMETER_LIST(plst_id); 
 plst_id := CREATE_PARAMETER_LIST('plst_form_params');
 END IF;
 ADD_PARAMETER(plst_id,'Parm_query',TEXT_PARAMETER,LRTYPE_RPT_DEF.RPT_QUERY);
 ADD_PARAMETER(plst_id,'PARM_APP_NAME',TEXT_PARAMETER,'WIZERP');
 ADD_PARAMETER(plst_id,'PARM_rep_NAME',TEXT_PARAMETER,RPT_NAME);

 ADD_PARAMETER(plst_id,'PARM_FORM_NAME',TEXT_PARAMETER,
 FTREE.GET_TREE_NODE_PROPERTY('MENU',:SYSTEM.TRIGGER_NODE,FTREE.NODE_LABEL));
 
 
 /*ADD_PARAMETER(plst_id,'PARM_FIRST_CLM_DESC',TEXT_PARAMETER,SUBSTR(FIRST_CLM_NAME,1,
 FUN_INSTR(FIRST_CLM_NAME,' ',1,1)));*/
 IF FIRST_CLM_NAME IS NOT NULL THEN
 ADD_PARAMETER(plst_id,'PARM_FIRST_CLM_DESC',TEXT_PARAMETER,FIRST_CLM_NAME);
 ADD_PARAMETER(plst_id,'PARM_FIRST_CLM_NAME',TEXT_PARAMETER,FIRST_CLM_NAME);
 END IF;
 IF SECOND_CLM_NAME IS NOT NULL THEN
 ADD_PARAMETER(plst_id,'PARM_SECOND_CLM_NAME',TEXT_PARAMETER,SECOND_CLM_NAME);

 /*ADD_PARAMETER(plst_id,'PARM_SECOND_CLM_DESC',TEXT_PARAMETER,SUBSTR(SECOND_CLM_NAME,1,
 FUN_INSTR(SECOND_CLM_NAME,' ',1,1)));*/
 END IF;
 IF THIRD_CLM_NAME IS NOT NULL THEN
 ADD_PARAMETER(plst_id,'PARM_THIRD_CLM_NAME',TEXT_PARAMETER,THIRD_CLM_NAME);

 IF FOURTH_CLM_NAME IS NOT NULL THEN

 IF FIFTH_CLM_NAME IS NOT NULL THEN

 ADD_PARAMETER(plst_id,'PARM_FIFTH_CLM_DESC',TEXT_PARAMETER,FIFTH_CLM_NAME );
 END IF;
 IF SIXTH_CLM_NAME IS NOT NULL THEN
 ADD_PARAMETER(plst_id,'PARM_SIXTH_CLM_NAME',TEXT_PARAMETER,SIXTH_CLM_NAME );
 ADD_PARAMETER(plst_id,'PARM_SIXTH_CLM_DESC',TEXT_PARAMETER,SIXTH_CLM_NAME );
 END IF;
 --ADD_PARAMETER(plst_id,'paramform',TEXT_PARAMETER,'NO'); 
 --RUN_PRODUCT(REPORTS,RPT_PATH,ASYNCHRONOUS,RUNTIME,FILESYSTEM,plst_id,null);
 --OPEN_FORM('D:\Projects\Wizerp\Forms\Criteria forms\'||frm_name ,ACTIVATE,SESSION,SHARE_LIBRARY_DATA,plst_id); 
 --CALL_FORM('D:\Projects\Wizerp\Forms\Criteria forms\'||frm_name,HIDE,NO_REPLACE,NO_QUERY_ONLY,plst_id); 
 CALL_FORM('D:\Projects\Wizerp\Forms\Criteria forms\'||frm_name,NO_HIDE,NO_REPLACE,NO_QUERY_ONLY,plst_id); 
 END IF;
 /* ELSE
 RUN_PRODUCT(REPORTS,PATH_R,ASYNCHRONOUS,RUNTIME,FILESYSTEM,'');
 END IF;*/
 
 
 /********** abid *****************************/

 END IF; 
/*
--------------------------------ELSE CHECKING FOR SEGMENT VALUES-----------------------------
 ELSE
 lnod_node_parent := FTREE.GET_TREE_NODE_PARENT('MENU',N_NAME);
 label_name:=:LIST_NODE_NAME --FTREE.GET_TREE_NODE_PROPERTY('MENU',lnod_node_parent,FTREE.NODE_LABEL);
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 IF label_name = 'Segment Values' 
 OR label_name = 'Listings' 
 THEN

 END IF;

 ADD_PARAMETER(plst_id,'parm_struc_id',TEXT_PARAMETER,:PARAMETER.PARM_STRUC_ID);

 IF NOT id_null(form_id) THEN
 GO_FORM(form_id);
 ELSE
 OPEN_FORM('D:\PROJECTS\WIZERP\FORMS\FORM_WIZ_SEGMENTS_MD.FMX',ACTIVATE,SESSION,SHARE_LIBRARY_DATA,plst_id);
 END IF;
 ELSIF label_name='Listings' THEN
 form_id:=FIND_FORM('FORM_SEGMENT_LISTING');
 IF NOT id_null(form_id) THEN
 GO_FORM(form_id);
 ELSE
 OPEN_FORM('D:\PROJECTS\WIZERP\FORMS\FORM_SEGMENT_LISTING.FMX',ACTIVATE,SESSION,SHARE_LIBRARY_DATA,plst_id);
 END IF;
 END IF;
 END IF; 
 END IF; */

--------------------------------IF CHK_PATH IS 0--------------------------------------------

 ELSE
 IF SUBSTR(PATH_R,LENGTH(PATH_R)-2)='FMX' OR SUBSTR(PATH_R,LENGTH(PATH_R)-2)='fmx' THEN
 label_name:=:LIST_NODE_NAME;--FTREE.GET_TREE_NODE_PROPERTY('MENU',N_NAME,FTREE.NODE_LABEL);

---------------------CHECKING FOR JOURNAL NARRATION FORM-----------------------------------

 IF label_name = 'Journal Narration' THEN
 form_id:=FIND_FORM(form_name);
 IF NOT id_null(form_id) THEN
 GO_FORM(form_id);
 ELSE
 p_list := get_parameter_list('p_list');
 IF NOT id_null(p_list) THEN
 destroy_parameter_list(p_list);
 END IF;
 p_list := create_parameter_list('p_list');
 add_parameter(p_list,'MAST_QUERY_SOURCE',text_parameter,'JRN_LINE_DESC_MT');
 add_parameter(p_list,'DET_QUERY_SOURCE',text_parameter,'JRN_LINE_DESC_FIELDS a,FLEX_VALUE_SET_MT B');
 add_parameter(p_list,'WHERE_CLAUSE',text_parameter,'B.value_set_id=A.value_set_id');
 add_parameter(p_list,'DML_TARGET',text_parameter,'JRN_LINE_DESC_FIELDS A');
 add_parameter(p_list,'PARM_FORM_NAME',text_parameter,'JRN_LINE_DESC_MT');
 OPEN_FORM(PATH_R,ACTIVATE,SESSION,SHARE_LIBRARY_DATA,P_LIST);
 END IF;

---------------------CHECKING FOR JOURNAL DESCRIPTION FORM----------------------------------- 

 ELSIF label_name = 'Journal Description' THEN
 form_id:=FIND_FORM(form_name);
 IF NOT id_null(form_id) THEN
 GO_FORM(form_id);
 ELSE
 p_list := get_parameter_list('p_list');
 IF NOT id_null(p_list) THEN
 destroy_parameter_list(p_list);
 END IF;
 p_list := create_parameter_list('p_list');
 add_parameter(p_list,'MAST_QUERY_SOURCE',text_parameter,'JRN_MT_DESC_MT');
 add_parameter(p_list,'DET_QUERY_SOURCE',text_parameter,'JRN_MT_DESC_FIELDS a,FLEX_VALUE_SET_MT B');
 add_parameter(p_list,'WHERE_CLAUSE',text_parameter,'B.value_set_id=A.value_set_id');
 add_parameter(p_list,'DML_TARGET',text_parameter,'JRN_MT_DESC_FIELDS A');
 add_parameter(p_list,'PARM_FORM_NAME',text_parameter,'JRN_MT_DESC_MT');
 OPEN_FORM(PATH_R,ACTIVATE,SESSION,SHARE_LIBRARY_DATA,P_LIST);
 END IF;
 END IF;
--------------------------------CHECKING FOR JOURNAL FORM-----------------------------------
 IF label_name IN('Journal','Encumbrance Journal') THEN
 plst_id := GET_PARAMETER_LIST('plst_form_params');
 IF ID_NULL(plst_id) THEN
 plst_id := CREATE_PARAMETER_LIST('plst_form_params');
 ELSE
 DESTROY_PARAMETER_LIST(plst_id); 
 plst_id := CREATE_PARAMETER_LIST('plst_form_params');
 END IF;
 form_id:=FIND_FORM(form_name);
 
 IF NOT id_null(form_id) THEN
 GO_FORM(form_id);
 ELSE
 IF label_name=('Journal') THEN
 ADD_PARAMETER(plst_id,'PARM_MENU_BUTTON',TEXT_PARAMETER,'J');
 OPEN_FORM(PATH_R,ACTIVATE,SESSION,SHARE_LIBRARY_DATA,plst_id);
 ELSE
 ADD_PARAMETER(plst_id,'PARM_MENU_BUTTON',TEXT_PARAMETER,'E');
 OPEN_FORM(PATH_R,ACTIVATE,SESSION,SHARE_LIBRARY_DATA,plst_id);
 END IF;
 END IF;
----------------------------------------IF OTHER FORMS------------------------------------- 
 ELSE
 form_id:=FIND_FORM(form_name);
 IF NOT id_null(form_id) THEN
 GO_FORM(form_id);
 ELSE
 OPEN_FORM(PATH_R,ACTIVATE,SESSION,SHARE_LIBRARY_DATA);
 END IF;
 END IF;
 
---------------------------------------IF REPORT WITH PATH-----------------------------------
 ELSIF SUBSTR(PATH_R,LENGTH(PATH_R)-2)='REP' OR SUBSTR(PATH_R,LENGTH(PATH_R)-2)='rep' THEN
 RUN_PRODUCT(REPORTS,PATH_R,ASYNCHRONOUS,RUNTIME,FILESYSTEM,'');
 END IF;
 
 END IF;
 END IF;

EXCEPTION
 WHEN NO_DATA_FOUND THEN
 A:=INSTR(N_NAME,'\');
 label_name:='';
 IF SUBSTR(N_NAME,A+1)='rep' THEN --or SUBSTR(N_NAME,A+1)='rep' THEN
 N_NAME:=SUBSTR(N_NAME,1,A-1);
 P_find_node := Ftree.Find_Tree_Node(htree,
 'Segment Listings',
 Ftree.FIND_NEXT,
 Ftree.NODE_LABEL,
 Ftree.ROOT_NODE, 
 Ftree.ROOT_NODE);
 
 find_node := Ftree.Find_Tree_Node(htree, 
 N_NAME,
 Ftree.FIND_NEXT,
 Ftree.NODE_LABEL,
 Ftree.ROOT_NODE, 
 P_find_node);
 
 label_name := FTREE.GET_TREE_NODE_PROPERTY(htree,find_node,FTREE.NODE_VALUE);
 plst_id := GET_PARAMETER_LIST('plst_form_params');
 IF ID_NULL(plst_id) THEN
 plst_id := CREATE_PARAMETER_LIST('plst_form_params');
 ELSE
 DESTROY_PARAMETER_LIST(plst_id); 
 plst_id := CREATE_PARAMETER_LIST('plst_form_params');
 END IF;
 --ADD_PARAMETER(plst_id,'parm_table_name',TEXT_PARAMETER,'VIEW_WIZ_SEGMENT02');
 ADD_PARAMETER(plst_id,'parm_table_name',TEXT_PARAMETER,label_name);
 ADD_PARAMETER(plst_id,'parm_struc_id',TEXT_PARAMETER,:PARAMETER.PARM_STRUC_ID);
 form_id:=FIND_FORM('FORM_WIZ_SEGMENTS_MD');
 IF NOT id_null(form_id) THEN
 GO_FORM(form_id);
 ELSE
 OPEN_FORM('FORM_SEGMENT_LISTING.FMX',ACTIVATE,SESSION,SHARE_LIBRARY_DATA,plst_id);
 END IF;
 ELSIF SUBSTR(N_NAME,A+1)='frm' THEN
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 
 N_NAME:=SUBSTR(N_NAME,1,A-1);
 P_find_node := Ftree.Find_Tree_Node(htree, 
 'Segment Values',
 Ftree.FIND_NEXT,
 Ftree.NODE_LABEL,
 Ftree.ROOT_NODE, 
 Ftree.ROOT_NODE);
 
 find_node := Ftree.Find_Tree_Node(htree, 
 N_NAME,
 Ftree.FIND_NEXT,
 Ftree.NODE_LABEL,
 Ftree.ROOT_NODE, 
 P_find_node);
 
 label_name := FTREE.GET_TREE_NODE_PROPERTY(htree,find_node,FTREE.NODE_VALUE);
 plst_id := GET_PARAMETER_LIST('plst_form_params');
 IF ID_NULL(plst_id) THEN
 plst_id := CREATE_PARAMETER_LIST('plst_form_params');
 ELSE
 DESTROY_PARAMETER_LIST(plst_id); 
 plst_id := CREATE_PARAMETER_LIST('plst_form_params');
 END IF;
 --ADD_PARAMETER(plst_id,'parm_table_name',TEXT_PARAMETER,'VIEW_WIZ_SEGMENT02');
 
 ADD_PARAMETER(plst_id,'parm_table_name',TEXT_PARAMETER,label_name);
 ADD_PARAMETER(plst_id,'parm_struc_id',TEXT_PARAMETER,:PARAMETER.PARM_STRUC_ID);
 form_id:=FIND_FORM('FORM_WIZ_SEGMENTS_MD');
 IF NOT id_null(form_id) THEN
 GO_FORM(form_id);
 ELSE
 OPEN_FORM('FORM_WIZ_SEGMENTS_MD.FMX',ACTIVATE,SESSION,SHARE_LIBRARY_DATA,plst_id);
 
 END IF; 
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 END IF;
END;

MenuItem.Name: REMOVE_FROM_LIST
MenuItem.Label: Remove From List
MenuItem.MenuItemCode:
DECLARE
A NUMBER;
N_NAME VARCHAR2(100);
list_label VARCHAR2(100);
lent NUMBER;
BEGIN
 
 list_label := :list_node_name;
 
 IF UPPER(SUBSTR(list_label,-14))='SEGMENT VALUES' THEN
 lent:=length(list_label);
 list_label:=SUBSTR(list_label,1,lent-15);
 list_label:=list_label||'\frm';
 DELETE FROM WIZMENU_FAVOURIT_ERP WHERE NODE_NAME = list_label;
 COMMIT;
 ELSIF UPPER(SUBSTR(list_label,-15))='SEGMENT LISTING' THEN
 lent:=length(list_label);
 list_label:=SUBSTR(list_label,1,lent-16);
 list_label:=list_label||'\rep';
 DELETE FROM WIZMENU_FAVOURIT_ERP WHERE NODE_NAME = list_label;
 COMMIT;
 ELSE
 DELETE FROM WIZMENU_FAVOURIT_ERP WHERE NODE_NAME = list_label;
 COMMIT;
 END IF;
 

CLEAR_LIST('LIST_NODE_NAME');

FOR POP_REC IN(SELECT NODE_ID,NODE_NAME LABEL_NAME,NODE_NAME LABEL_VAL FROM WIZMENU_FAVOURIT_ERP ORDER BY NODE_ID) LOOP
 A:=INSTR(POP_REC.LABEL_NAME,'\');
 IF SUBSTR(POP_REC.LABEL_NAME,A+1)='frm' THEN --or SUBSTR(N_NAME,A+1)='rep' THEN
 N_NAME:=SUBSTR(POP_REC.LABEL_NAME,1,A-1);
 N_NAME:=N_NAME||' '||'Segment Values';
 ADD_LIST_ELEMENT('LIST_NODE_NAME',POP_REC.NODE_ID,N_NAME,N_NAME);
 ELSIF SUBSTR(POP_REC.LABEL_NAME,A+1)='rep' THEN 
 N_NAME:=SUBSTR(POP_REC.LABEL_NAME,1,A-1);
 N_NAME:=N_NAME||' '||'Segment Listing';
 ADD_LIST_ELEMENT('LIST_NODE_NAME',POP_REC.NODE_ID,N_NAME,N_NAME);
 ELSE
 ADD_LIST_ELEMENT('LIST_NODE_NAME',POP_REC.NODE_ID,POP_REC.LABEL_NAME,POP_REC.LABEL_VAL);
 END IF; 
 
 --RGRP_POP:=POPULATE_GROUP('RGRP_FAVOURIT');
END LOOP;
END;

MenuItem.Name: ADD_TO_FAVOURITES
MenuItem.Label: Add To Favourites
MenuItem.MenuItemCode:
DECLARE
 label_name VARCHAR2(100);
 lvch_max_vrno NUMBER(5);
 label_node VARCHAR2(100);
 mi_id MENUITEM;
 lnod_node_parent FTREE.NODE;
 A NUMBER;
 N_NAME VARCHAR2(100);
 
BEGIN
 
 lnod_node_parent := FTREE.GET_TREE_NODE_PARENT('MENU',:SYSTEM.TRIGGER_NODE);
 label_name:=FTREE.GET_TREE_NODE_PROPERTY('MENU',lnod_node_parent,FTREE.NODE_LABEL);
 IF UPPER(label_name)='SEGMENT VALUES' THEN
 label_name:=FTREE.GET_TREE_NODE_PROPERTY('MENU',:SYSTEM.TRIGGER_NODE,FTREE.NODE_LABEL); 
 label_name:=label_name||'\frm';
 ELSIF UPPER(label_name)='SEGMENT LISTINGS' THEN
 label_name:=FTREE.GET_TREE_NODE_PROPERTY('MENU',:SYSTEM.TRIGGER_NODE,FTREE.NODE_LABEL); 
 label_name:=label_name||'\rep';
 ELSE
 label_name:=FTREE.GET_TREE_NODE_PROPERTY('MENU',:SYSTEM.TRIGGER_NODE,FTREE.NODE_LABEL);
 END IF;
 
 SELECT NODE_NAME INTO label_node FROM WIZMENU_FAVOURIT_ERP WHERE NODE_NAME=label_name;
 
 IF label_node IS NOT NULL THEN
 MESSAGE('Form Is Already In Favourities List'); 
 END IF;
 
EXCEPTION
 WHEN NO_DATA_FOUND THEN
 
 SELECT NVL(MAX(NODE_ID),0)+1 INTO lvch_max_vrno FROM WIZMENU_FAVOURIT_ERP;

 IF lvch_max_vrno IS NULL THEN
 PCKG_FORMS.PRO_TEXTBOX_EN(1);
 :DBLK_WIZMENU_FAVOURIT.TEXT_NODE_ID:=1;
 ELSE
 :DBLK_WIZMENU_FAVOURIT.TEXT_NODE_ID:=lvch_max_vrno; 
 END IF;
 
 
 INSERT INTO WIZMENU_FAVOURIT_ERP(NODE_ID,NODE_NAME) VALUES(lvch_max_vrno,LABEL_NAME);
 COMMIT;
 mi_id := Find_Menu_Item('POPUP_MENU.ADD_TO_FAVOURITES');
 Set_Menu_Item_Property(mi_id,ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);

 CLEAR_LIST('LIST_NODE_NAME');

 FOR POP_REC IN(SELECT NODE_ID,NODE_NAME LABEL_NAME,NODE_NAME LABEL_VAL FROM WIZMENU_FAVOURIT_ERP ORDER BY NODE_ID) LOOP
 A:=INSTR(POP_REC.LABEL_NAME,'\');
 IF SUBSTR(POP_REC.LABEL_NAME,A+1)='frm' THEN --or SUBSTR(N_NAME,A+1)='rep' THEN
 N_NAME:=SUBSTR(POP_REC.LABEL_NAME,1,A-1);
 N_NAME:=N_NAME||' '||'Segment Values';
 ADD_LIST_ELEMENT('LIST_NODE_NAME',POP_REC.NODE_ID,N_NAME,N_NAME);
 
 ELSIF SUBSTR(POP_REC.LABEL_NAME,A+1)='rep' THEN 
 N_NAME:=SUBSTR(POP_REC.LABEL_NAME,1,A-1);
 N_NAME:=N_NAME||' '||'Segment Listing';
 ADD_LIST_ELEMENT('LIST_NODE_NAME',POP_REC.NODE_ID,N_NAME,N_NAME);
 ELSE
 ADD_LIST_ELEMENT('LIST_NODE_NAME',POP_REC.NODE_ID,POP_REC.LABEL_NAME,POP_REC.LABEL_VAL);
 END IF; 
 
 --RGRP_POP:=POPULATE_GROUP('RGRP_FAVOURIT');
 END LOOP;
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: POP_SEG_NODE
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE POP_SEG_NODE(PARENT_NODE VARCHAR2) IS
 htree ITEM;
 find_node FTREE.NODE;
 var_temp NUMBER(5);
 temp_rgrp RECORDGROUP;
 new_node NUMBER(5);
 item_value VARCHAR2(30);
 CNT NUMBER(2);
BEGIN
 
 htree := Find_Item('TREE_BLOCK.MENU');
 CNT := GET_GROUP_ROW_COUNT('RGRP_CHK_SEGMENT');
 
 IF CNT > 0 THEN -- IF THE PARENT KEY LIST IS FILLED

 find_node := Ftree.Find_Tree_Node(htree, 
 --'Segment Values',
 PARENT_NODE,
 Ftree.FIND_NEXT,
 Ftree.NODE_LABEL,
 Ftree.ROOT_NODE, 
 Ftree.ROOT_NODE);

 FOR j IN 1..CNT LOOP 
 item_value := GET_GROUP_CHAR_CELL( 'RGRP_CHK_SEGMENT.a', j ); 
 IF j < 9 THEN 
 new_node := Ftree.Add_Tree_Node(htree,
 find_node,
 Ftree.PARENT_OFFSET,
 Ftree.LAST_CHILD,
 Ftree.expanded_NODE,
 item_value,
 NULL,
 'VIEW_WIZ_SEGMENT'||'0'||j);
 --'\\Rizwan\Projects\WizERP\Forms\FORM_WIZ_SEGMENTS_MD.fmx');
 ELSE
 new_node := Ftree.Add_Tree_Node(htree,
 find_node,
 Ftree.PARENT_OFFSET,
 Ftree.LAST_CHILD,
 Ftree.expanded_NODE,
 item_value,
 NULL,
 'VIEW_WIZ_SEGMENT10');
 END IF; 
 END LOOP;
 END IF; 
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: PRO_FORM_CALL
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE PRO_FORM_CALL IS

 N_NAME FTREE.NODE;
 PATH VARCHAR2(500);
 PATH_R VARCHAR2(300);
 A NUMBER;
 lnod_node_parent FTREE.NODE;
 plst_id PARAMLIST; 
 p_list PARAMLIST;
 label_name VARCHAR2(30);
 form_name VARCHAR2(30);
 form_id FORMMODULE;
BEGIN
 --MESSAGE('PRO FORM CALL');
 N_NAME := :SYSTEM.TRIGGER_NODE;
 PATH := FTREE.GET_TREE_NODE_PROPERTY('MENU',N_NAME,FTREE.NODE_VALUE);
 A:=INSTR(PATH,'\',-1);
 PATH_R:=SUBSTR(PATH,A+1); 
 form_name:=SUBSTR(path_r,1,length(path_r)-4);
 label_name:=FTREE.GET_TREE_NODE_PROPERTY('MENU',N_NAME,FTREE.NODE_LABEL);
 ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 
 IF :CHK_PATH=1 THEN

 IF label_name = 'Journal Narration' THEN
 form_id:=FIND_FORM(form_name);
 IF NOT id_null(form_id) THEN
 GO_FORM(form_id);
 ELSE
 p_list := get_parameter_list('p_list');
 IF NOT id_null(p_list) THEN
 destroy_parameter_list(p_list);
 END IF;
 p_list := create_parameter_list('p_list');
 add_parameter(p_list,'MAST_QUERY_SOURCE',text_parameter,'JRN_LINE_DESC_MT');
 add_parameter(p_list,'DET_QUERY_SOURCE',text_parameter,'JRN_LINE_DESC_FIELDS a,FLEX_VALUE_SET_MT B');
 add_parameter(p_list,'WHERE_CLAUSE',text_parameter,'B.value_set_id=A.value_set_id');
 add_parameter(p_list,'DML_TARGET',text_parameter,'JRN_LINE_DESC_FIELDS A');
 add_parameter(p_list,'PARM_FORM_NAME',text_parameter,'JRN_LINE_DESC_MT');
 OPEN_FORM(PATH,ACTIVATE,SESSION,SHARE_LIBRARY_DATA,P_LIST);
 END IF;
 ELSIF label_name = 'Journal Description' THEN
 form_id:=FIND_FORM(form_name);
 IF NOT id_null(form_id) THEN
 GO_FORM(form_id);
 ELSE
 p_list := get_parameter_list('p_list');
 IF NOT id_null(p_list) THEN
 destroy_parameter_list(p_list);
 END IF;
 p_list := create_parameter_list('p_list');
 add_parameter(p_list,'MAST_QUERY_SOURCE',text_parameter,'JRN_MT_DESC_MT');
 add_parameter(p_list,'DET_QUERY_SOURCE',text_parameter,'JRN_MT_DESC_FIELDS a,FLEX_VALUE_SET_MT B');
 add_parameter(p_list,'WHERE_CLAUSE',text_parameter,'B.value_set_id=A.value_set_id');
 add_parameter(p_list,'DML_TARGET',text_parameter,'JRN_MT_DESC_FIELDS A');
 add_parameter(p_list,'PARM_FORM_NAME',text_parameter,'JRN_MT_DESC_MT');
 OPEN_FORM(PATH,ACTIVATE,SESSION,SHARE_LIBRARY_DATA,P_LIST);
 END IF;
 END IF;
 -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 IF label_name IN('Journal','Encumbrance Journal') THEN
 plst_id := GET_PARAMETER_LIST('plst_form_params');
 IF ID_NULL(plst_id) THEN
 plst_id := CREATE_PARAMETER_LIST('plst_form_params');
 ELSE
 DESTROY_PARAMETER_LIST(plst_id); 
 plst_id := CREATE_PARAMETER_LIST('plst_form_params');
 END IF;
 form_id:=FIND_FORM(form_name);
 
 IF NOT id_null(form_id) THEN
 GO_FORM(form_id);
 ELSE
 IF label_name=('Journal') THEN
 ADD_PARAMETER(plst_id,'PARM_MENU_BUTTON',TEXT_PARAMETER,'J');
 OPEN_FORM(PATH,ACTIVATE,SESSION,SHARE_LIBRARY_DATA,plst_id);
 ELSE
 ADD_PARAMETER(plst_id,'PARM_MENU_BUTTON',TEXT_PARAMETER,'E');
 OPEN_FORM(PATH,ACTIVATE,SESSION,SHARE_LIBRARY_DATA,plst_id);
 END IF;
 END IF;
 ELSE
 
 form_id:=FIND_FORM(form_name);
 IF NOT id_null(form_id) THEN
 GO_FORM(form_id);
 ELSE
 OPEN_FORM(PATH,ACTIVATE,SESSION,SHARE_LIBRARY_DATA);
 END IF;
 END IF;
 lnod_node_parent := FTREE.GET_TREE_NODE_PARENT('MENU',N_NAME);
 label_name:=FTREE.GET_TREE_NODE_PROPERTY('MENU',lnod_node_parent,FTREE.NODE_LABEL);
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 
 IF label_name = 'Segment Values' 
 OR label_name = 'Listings' 
 THEN
 plst_id := GET_PARAMETER_LIST('plst_form_params');
 IF ID_NULL(plst_id) THEN
 plst_id := CREATE_PARAMETER_LIST('plst_form_params');
 ELSE
 DESTROY_PARAMETER_LIST(plst_id); 
 plst_id := CREATE_PARAMETER_LIST('plst_form_params');
 END IF;
 --ADD_PARAMETER(plst_id,'parm_table_name',TEXT_PARAMETER,'VIEW_WIZ_SEGMENT02');
 ADD_PARAMETER(plst_id,'parm_table_name',TEXT_PARAMETER,PATH);
 ADD_PARAMETER(plst_id,'parm_struc_id',TEXT_PARAMETER,:PARAMETER.PARM_STRUC_ID);
 IF label_name='Segment Values' THEN
 
 form_id:=FIND_FORM('FORM_WIZ_SEGMENTS_MD');
 IF NOT id_null(form_id) THEN
 GO_FORM(form_id);
 ELSE
 OPEN_FORM('D:\PROJECTS\WIZERP\FORMS\FORM_WIZ_SEGMENTS_MD.FMX',ACTIVATE,SESSION,SHARE_LIBRARY_DATA,plst_id);
 END IF;
 ELSIF label_name='Listings' THEN
 
 form_id:=FIND_FORM('FORM_SEGMENT_LISTING');
 IF NOT id_null(form_id) THEN
 GO_FORM(form_id);
 ELSE
 OPEN_FORM('D:\PROJECTS\WIZERP\FORMS\FORM_SEGMENT_LISTING.FMX',ACTIVATE,SESSION,SHARE_LIBRARY_DATA,plst_id);
 END IF;
 END IF;
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 END IF;
 END IF;
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: WIN
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PACKAGE WIN IS

 PROCEDURE CHANGE_ICON(ICON_FILE VARCHAR2);
-- PRAGMA INTERFACE(C,externICON,11265);

END;

ProgramUnit.Name: WIN
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PACKAGE BODY WIN IS
 FUNCTION externICON ( hFunc IN ORA_FFI.funcHandleType,
 hWnd IN PLS_INTEGER,
 IconFile IN OUT VARCHAR2,
 IconIndex IN PLS_INTEGER,
 IconFileSM IN OUT VARCHAR2,
 IconIndexSM IN PLS_INTEGER)
 return PLS_INTEGER;
 PRAGMA INTERFACE(C,externICON,11265);
 
 
 PROCEDURE CHANGE_ICON(ICON_FILE VARCHAR2) IS 
 
 hDLL ORA_FFI.LibHandleType;
 fh_ChangeIcon ora_ffi.funcHandleType;
 vcBuff1 varchar2(512);
 vcBuff2 varchar2(512);
 vcBuff3 varchar2(512);
 iBuff1 pls_integer;
 iBuff2 pls_integer;
 iBuff3 pls_integer;
 iRC pls_integer;
 
BEGIN
 
 hDLL := ORA_FFI.LOAD_LIBRARY('', 'D2KWUT60.DLL');
 fh_ChangeIcon := ora_ffi.register_function(hDLL,'d2kwutil_ChangeMDIIcon',ora_ffi.PASCAL_STD);
 ora_ffi.register_parameter(fh_ChangeIcon,ORA_FFI.C_INT); 
 ora_ffi.register_parameter(fh_ChangeIcon,ORA_FFI.C_CHAR_PTR);
 ora_ffi.register_parameter(fh_ChangeIcon,ORA_FFI.C_INT);
 ora_ffi.register_parameter(fh_ChangeIcon,ORA_FFI.C_CHAR_PTR);
 ora_ffi.register_parameter(fh_ChangeIcon,ORA_FFI.C_INT);
 ora_ffi.register_return(fh_ChangeIcon,ORA_FFI.C_INT);
 

 vcBuff1 := rpad(ICON_FILE,255,chr(0));
 vcBuff2 := rpad(ICON_FILE,255,chr(0));
 iBuff1 := GET_WINDOW_PROPERTY(FORMS_MDI_WINDOW,WINDOW_HANDLE);--MDIWindow;
 iBuff2 := 0;
 iBuff3 := 0;
 
 iRC := externICON(fh_ChangeIcon,iBuff1,vcBuff1,iBuff2,vcBuff2,iBuff3);

END;


END;

ProgramUnit.Name: PRO_POP_NODE
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE PRO_POP_NODE(PARENT_NODE VARCHAR2) IS
 htree ITEM;
 find_node FTREE.NODE;
 P_find_node FTREE.NODE;
 var_temp NUMBER(5);
 temp_rgrp RECORDGROUP;
 new_node NUMBER(5);
 item_value VARCHAR2(30);
 CNT NUMBER(2);
 lnum_rej_vs_recd NUMBER;
 lnum_appr_vs_Recd NUMBER;
 lnum_vs_recd_for_app NUMBER;
 lnum_rdy_to_snd_for_App NUMBER;
 lnum_enable_jrn_appr_yn NUMBER(1);
 
BEGIN
 
 SELECT ENABLE_JRN_APPR_YN INTO lnum_enable_jrn_appr_yn FROM WIZ_GL_SET_OF_BOOKS 
 WHERE SET_OF_BOOK_ID=:GLOBAL.gnum_SET_OF_BOOK_ID;
 IF lnum_enable_jrn_appr_yn=1 THEN
 htree := Find_Item('TREE_BLOCK.MENU');
 --PCKG_GCNSTS.pnum_login_emp:=2;
 PRO_COUNTS_REC_REJ_VR(PCKG_GCNSTS.pnum_login_emp,lnum_rej_vs_recd,lnum_appr_vs_Recd,
 lnum_vs_recd_for_app,lnum_rdy_to_snd_for_App);
 
 P_find_node := Ftree.Find_Tree_Node(htree, 
 --'Segment Values',
 PARENT_NODE,
 Ftree.FIND_NEXT,
 Ftree.NODE_LABEL,
 Ftree.ROOT_NODE, 
 Ftree.ROOT_NODE);
 IF lnum_rdy_to_snd_for_App>0 THEN
 new_node := Ftree.Add_Tree_Node(htree,
 P_find_node,
 Ftree.PARENT_OFFSET,
 Ftree.LAST_CHILD,
 Ftree.expanded_NODE,
 --item_value,
 'Ready To Send For Approval '||'- '||lnum_rdy_to_snd_for_App,
 NULL,
 'FRM_JOURNAL.FMX');
 :PARAMETER.PARM_1ST:=new_node;
 END IF; 
 
 IF lnum_vs_recd_for_app > 0 THEN
 new_node := Ftree.Add_Tree_Node(htree,
 P_find_node,
 Ftree.PARENT_OFFSET,
 Ftree.LAST_CHILD,
 Ftree.expanded_NODE,
 --item_value,
 'Received For Approval '||'- '||lnum_vs_recd_for_app,
 NULL,
 'FORM_CRIT_AUTH_DET.FMX');
 :PARAMETER.PARM_2ND:=new_node;
 END IF; 
 
 IF lnum_appr_vs_Recd > 0 THEN
 new_node := Ftree.Add_Tree_Node(htree,
 P_find_node,
 Ftree.PARENT_OFFSET,
 Ftree.LAST_CHILD,
 Ftree.expanded_NODE,
 --item_value,
 'Approved Vouchers Received '||'- '||lnum_appr_vs_Recd,
 NULL,
 'FRM_JOURNAL.FMX');
 :PARAMETER.PARM_3RD:=new_node;
 END IF;
 
 IF lnum_rej_vs_recd>0 THEN 
 new_node := Ftree.Add_Tree_Node(htree,
 P_find_node,
 Ftree.PARENT_OFFSET,
 Ftree.LAST_CHILD,
 Ftree.expanded_NODE,
 --item_value,
 'Rejected Vouchers Received '||'- '||lnum_rej_vs_recd,
 NULL,
 'FRM_JOURNAL.FMX');
 :PARAMETER.PARM_4TH:=new_node;
 
 END IF;
 END IF;
 

END;

ProgramUnit.Name: POP_SEG_LIST_NODE
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE POP_SEG_LIST_NODE(PARENT_NODE VARCHAR2) IS
 htree ITEM;
 find_node FTREE.NODE;
 var_temp NUMBER(5);
 temp_rgrp RECORDGROUP;
 new_node NUMBER(5);
 item_value VARCHAR2(30);
 CNT NUMBER(2);
BEGIN
 
 htree := Find_Item('TREE_BLOCK.MENU');
 CNT := GET_GROUP_ROW_COUNT('RGRP_CHK_SEGMENT');
 
 IF CNT > 0 THEN -- IF THE PARENT KEY LIST IS FILLED

 find_node := Ftree.Find_Tree_Node(htree, 
 --'Segment Values',
 PARENT_NODE,
 Ftree.FIND_NEXT,
 Ftree.NODE_LABEL,
 Ftree.ROOT_NODE, 
 Ftree.ROOT_NODE);

 FOR j IN 1..CNT LOOP 
 item_value := GET_GROUP_CHAR_CELL( 'RGRP_CHK_SEGMENT.a', j ); 
 IF j < 9 THEN 
 new_node := Ftree.Add_Tree_Node(htree,
 find_node,
 Ftree.PARENT_OFFSET,
 Ftree.LAST_CHILD,
 Ftree.expanded_NODE,
 item_value,
 NULL,
 'WIZ_SEGMENT'||'0'||j);
 --'\\Rizwan\Projects\WizERP\Forms\FORM_WIZ_SEGMENTS_MD.fmx');
 ELSE
 new_node := Ftree.Add_Tree_Node(htree,
 find_node,
 Ftree.PARENT_OFFSET,
 Ftree.LAST_CHILD,
 Ftree.expanded_NODE,
 item_value,
 NULL,
 'WIZ_SEGMENT10');
 END IF; 
 END LOOP;
 END IF; 

END;

ProgramUnit.Name: GET_PARM_LIST
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
FUNCTION GET_PARM_LIST(parm_parm_string VARCHAR2) RETURN PARAMLIST IS

 plst_id PARAMLIST; 
 p_list PARAMLIST;
 label_name VARCHAR2(30);
 form_name VARCHAR2(100);
 form_id FORMMODULE;

 lvch_parameters WIZMENU_ERP.MENU_PARAMETERS%TYPE;
 lnum_carrot_sign NUMBER(14);
 lnum_instr NUMBER(14) := 1;
 lvch_str VARCHAR2(500) := parm_parm_string;
 lvch_remaining_str VARCHAR2(500);
 lnum_number NUMBER := 1;
 lvch_parm_name VARCHAR2(50);
 lvch_parm_value VARCHAR2(50);

BEGIN
 IF :CHK_PATH=1 THEN
 IF parm_parm_string IS NOT NULL THEN
 p_list := get_parameter_list('p_list');
 IF NOT id_null(p_list) THEN
 destroy_parameter_list(p_list);
 END IF;
 p_list := create_parameter_list('p_list');

 FOR R IN 0..HOW_MANY_CHARS(parm_parm_string,'^',1) LOOP
 
 lnum_instr := INSTR(lvch_str,'^');
 lnum_number := lnum_number + lnum_instr;
 IF lnum_instr > 0 THEN
 lvch_str := SUBSTR(lvch_str,1,lnum_instr-1);
 ELSIF lnum_instr > 0 THEN
 lvch_str := SUBSTR(lvch_str,1);
 END IF;
 
 lvch_parm_name := SUBSTR(lvch_str,1,INSTR(lvch_str,'=')-1);
 lvch_parm_value := SUBSTR(lvch_str,INSTR(lvch_str,'=')+1);

 ADD_PARAMETER(p_list, lvch_parm_name, TEXT_PARAMETER, lvch_parm_value);
 lvch_remaining_str := SUBSTR(parm_parm_string,lnum_number);
 lvch_str := lvch_remaining_str;

 END LOOP;

 END IF;
 --OPEN_FORM(form_name,ACTIVATE,SESSION,SHARE_LIBRARY_DATA,p_list);
 RETURN (p_list);
 END IF;
END;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-NEW-FORM-INSTANCE
Trigger.TriggerText:
DECLARE

 htree ITEM;
 find_node FTREE.NODE;
 var_temp NUMBER(5);
 temp_rgrp RECORDGROUP;
 new_node NUMBER(5);
 item_value VARCHAR2(30);
 CNT NUMBER(2);
 TIM TIMER;
 TIM2 TIMER;
 TIMER_ID TIMER;
 RGRP_POP NUMBER;
 A NUMBER;
 n_name VARCHAR2(100);
 LVCH_USERNAME VARCHAR2(100);
 LVCH_CO_NAME VARCHAR2(100);
 
 lvch_window_title VARCHAR2(100);
BEGIN

 TIM := CREATE_TIMER('SPLASH',3000,NO_REPEAT);
 TIM2 := CREATE_TIMER('NF',500,REPEAT);
-- TIMER_ID := CREATE_TIMER('Update_menu', 1800000, REPEAT);


 :PARAMETER.PARM_STRUC_ID := :GLOBAL.gnum_structure_id;
 :PARAMETER.PARM_SET_OF_BOOK_ID := :GLOBAL.gnum_set_of_book_id;
 :PARAMETER.PARM_USER_ID := :GLOBAL.gnum_login_emp;
 
 --- WIN.CHANGE_ICON('D:\PROJECTS\ICONS\12.ico');

 set_window_property(forms_mdi_window,HEIGHT,1); 
 set_window_property(forms_mdi_window,WIDTH,1); 
-- set_window_property(forms_mdi_window,TITLE,'WIZMEN GL '); 
 --set_window_property(forms_mdi_window,window_state,minimize);
-- READ_IMAGE_FILE('D:\Copy.BMP', 'BMP', 'TREE_SUB_BLOCK.IMAG_MAIN');
 
 --READ_IMAGE_FILE('D:\TOP.BMP', 'BMP', 'TREE_SUB_BLOCK.IMG_MENU_TOP');
 --READ_IMAGE_FILE('D:\TOP.BMP', 'BMP', 'TREE_SUB_BLOCK.IMG_MENU_BOTTOM');
 
 
 ftree.POPULATE_TREE('MENU');
-- set_window_property(forms_mdi_window,window_state,maximize);
-- set_window_property('window1',window_state,maximize);
 
/******************************************************************************************/
/* A GROUP IS ALSO FILLED TO GET THE NO OF THAT WILL BE RETURNED IN THE TREE AND BASED */
/* ON THIS COUNT WE ARE APPLYING A QUERY ON THE TREE THAT RETURNS ZERO ROWS */
/******************************************************************************************/
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 
 
 temp_rgrp := FIND_GROUP('RGRP_CHK_SEGMENT');
 IF NOT ID_NULL(temp_rgrp) THEN
 DELETE_GROUP(temp_rgrp);
 END IF;
 temp_rgrp := CREATE_GROUP_FROM_QUERY('RGRP_CHK_SEGMENT','SELECT SEGMENT_DESC A FROM WIZ_SEGMENT_DEFINITION WHERE STRUCTURE_ID = ' || :PARAMETER.PARM_STRUC_ID);
 var_temp := POPULATE_GROUP('RGRP_CHK_SEGMENT');

 SELECT SHORT_DESC 
 INTO
 LVCH_CO_NAME
 FROM ORGANIZATION_INFO
 WHERE set_of_book_id = :PARAMETER.PARM_SET_OF_BOOK_ID;

 SELECT FIRST_NAME||' '||LAST_NAME 
 INTO
 LVCH_USERNAME
 FROM EMPLOYEE_MT
 WHERE EMPLOYEE_ID = :PARAMETER.PARM_USER_ID;
 
 
 lvch_window_title := 'WIZMEN GL System - ';
 IF pckg_gcnsts.pnum_login_balancing_seg_id IS NULL THEN
 lvch_window_title := lvch_window_title||LVCH_CO_NAME;
 ELSE 
 lvch_window_title := lvch_window_title||pckg_gcnsts.pnum_login_balancing_seg_desc ;
 END IF; 
 
 IF pckg_gcnsts.pnum_login_period_id IS NOT NULL THEN
 lvch_window_title := lvch_window_title||'/'||pckg_gcnsts.pnum_login_period_desc ;
 END IF; 

 lvch_window_title := lvch_window_title ||' ('||LVCH_USERNAME||') '; 
 
 set_window_property(forms_mdi_window,TITLE,lvch_window_title ); 
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 --PCKG_GCNSTS.pnum_login_emp:=:PARAMETER.PARM_USER_ID;
 --MESSAGE('STRUC ID IS'||pckg_gcnsts.pnum_structure_id);
 --MESSAGE('STRUC ID IS'||pckg_gcnsts.pnum_structure_id);
 
 POP_SEG_NODE('Segment Values');
 POP_SEG_LIST_NODE('Segment Listings');
 --PRO_POP_NODE('Authorization');
 
 :chk_path:=1;
 --read_image_file('D:\PROJECTS\ICONS\glsplash.bmp','bmp','splash');

 
 FOR POP_REC IN(SELECT NODE_ID,NODE_NAME LABEL_NAME,NODE_NAME LABEL_VAL FROM WIZMENU_FAVOURIT_ERP ORDER BY NODE_ID) LOOP
 A:=INSTR(POP_REC.LABEL_NAME,'\');
 IF SUBSTR(POP_REC.LABEL_NAME,A+1)='frm' THEN --or SUBSTR(N_NAME,A+1)='rep' THEN
 N_NAME:=SUBSTR(POP_REC.LABEL_NAME,1,A-1);
 N_NAME:=N_NAME||' '||'Segment Values';
 ADD_LIST_ELEMENT('LIST_NODE_NAME',POP_REC.NODE_ID,N_NAME,N_NAME);
 ELSIF SUBSTR(POP_REC.LABEL_NAME,A+1)='rep' THEN 
 N_NAME:=SUBSTR(POP_REC.LABEL_NAME,1,A-1);
 N_NAME:=N_NAME||' '||'Segment Listing';
 ADD_LIST_ELEMENT('LIST_NODE_NAME',POP_REC.NODE_ID,N_NAME,N_NAME);
 ELSE
 ADD_LIST_ELEMENT('LIST_NODE_NAME',POP_REC.NODE_ID,POP_REC.LABEL_NAME,POP_REC.LABEL_VAL);
 END IF; 
 
 --RGRP_POP:=POPULATE_GROUP('RGRP_FAVOURIT');
 END LOOP;
 
 PCKG_MENUS.PRO_SCROLL_CNTRL;
 SET_MENU_ITEM_PROPERTY('ACTION_MENU.ADD_MENU',ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_MENU_ITEM_PROPERTY('ACTION_MENU.EDIT_MENU',ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE); 
 SET_MENU_ITEM_PROPERTY('ACTION_MENU.CANCEL_MENU',ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE); 
 SET_MENU_ITEM_PROPERTY('ACTION_MENU.SAVE_MENU',ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_MENU_ITEM_PROPERTY('SEARCH_MENU.FIND_MENU',ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_MENU_ITEM_PROPERTY('SEARCH_MENU.APPLY_MENU',ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_MENU_ITEM_PROPERTY('ACTION_MENU.FIND_HIDE',ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_MENU_ITEM_PROPERTY('ACTION_MENU.APPLY_HIDE',ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_MENU_ITEM_PROPERTY('ACTION_MENU.DELETE_MENU',ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 
 SET_MENU_ITEM_PROPERTY('ACTION_MENU.REFRESH_MENU',ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_MENU_ITEM_PROPERTY('ACTION_MENU.PRINT_MENU',ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_MENU_ITEM_PROPERTY('NAVIGATION_MENU.PRINT_HIDE',ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_MENU_ITEM_PROPERTY('ACTION_MENU.EXIT_MENU',ENABLED,PROPERTY_TRUE); 

--GO_BLOCK('DBLK_WIZMENU_FAVOURIT');
--EXECUTE_QUERY;
END ;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-TIMER-EXPIRED
Trigger.TriggerText:
DECLARE
 --N_NAME FTREE.NODE;
 N_NAME VARCHAR2(100);
 A NUMBER;

 label_name VARCHAR2(100);

--MESSAGE('TIMER EXPIRED IS '||GET_APPLICATION_PROPERTY(TIMER_NAME));

 DELETE_TIMER('NF');
 
 go_block('DBLK_LICENSED_TO');
 
 execute_query;
 
 GO_BLOCK('TREE_BLOCK');
 HIDE_WINDOW('WIND_SPLASH');
 set_window_property(forms_mdi_window,window_state,MAXIMIZE);

 ELSIF GET_APPLICATION_PROPERTY(TIMER_NAME)='UPDATE_MENU' THEN

 IF :PARAMETER.PARM_1ST IS NOT NULL THEN
 Ftree.Delete_Tree_Node(htree,:PARAMETER.PARM_1ST );
 END IF;
 IF :PARAMETER.PARM_2ND IS NOT NULL THEN
 Ftree.Delete_Tree_Node(htree,:PARAMETER.PARM_2ND );
 END IF;
 IF :PARAMETER.PARM_3RD IS NOT NULL THEN
 Ftree.Delete_Tree_Node(htree,:PARAMETER.PARM_3RD );
 END IF;
 IF :PARAMETER.PARM_4TH IS NOT NULL THEN
 Ftree.Delete_Tree_Node(htree,:PARAMETER.PARM_4TH );
 END IF;
 
 PRO_POP_NODE('Authorization');

 --Ftree.Delete_Tree_Node(htree,:PARAMETER.PARM_3RD );

 --N_NAME:=SUBSTR(N_NAME,1,A-1);
 /* P_find_node := Ftree.Find_Tree_Node(htree, 
 'Authorization',
 Ftree.FIND_NEXT,
 Ftree.NODE_LABEL,
 Ftree.ROOT_NODE, 
 Ftree.ROOT_NODE);*/
 
 
 
 
 

 
 /*find_node := Ftree.Find_Tree_Node(htree, 
 N_NAME,
 Ftree.FIND_NEXT,
 Ftree.NODE_LABEL,
 Ftree.ROOT_NODE, 
 P_find_node);*/
 
 --label_name := FTREE.GET_TREE_NODE_PROPERTY(htree,find_node,FTREE.NODE_VALUE);
 ELSE
-- MESSAGE(:CNT);
 :CNT:=:CNT+1;
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('T'||:CNT,VISIBLE,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 END IF;
END;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-WINDOW-ACTIVATED
Trigger.TriggerText:
DECLARE

 CNT NUMBER(2);

 temp_rgrp := FIND_GROUP('RGRP_CHK_SEGMENT');

 ADD_LIST_ELEMENT('LIST_NODE_NAME',POP_REC.NODE_ID,N_NAME,N_NAME);
 ELSIF SUBSTR(POP_REC.LABEL_NAME,A+1)='rep' THEN

 N_NAME:=N_NAME||' '||'Segment Listing';
 ADD_LIST_ELEMENT('LIST_NODE_NAME',POP_REC.NODE_ID,N_NAME,N_NAME);
 ELSE
 ADD_LIST_ELEMENT('LIST_NODE_NAME',POP_REC.NODE_ID,POP_REC.LABEL_NAME,POP_REC.LABEL_VAL);
 END IF; 
 
 --RGRP_POP:=POPULATE_GROUP('RGRP_FAVOURIT');
 END LOOP;
 
 PCKG_MENUS.PRO_SCROLL_CNTRL;
 SET_MENU_ITEM_PROPERTY('ACTION_MENU.ADD_MENU',ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_MENU_ITEM_PROPERTY('ACTION_MENU.EDIT_MENU',ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE); 
 SET_MENU_ITEM_PROPERTY('ACTION_MENU.CANCEL_MENU',ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);

 SET_MENU_ITEM_PROPERTY('ACTION_MENU.FIND_HIDE',ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);

 SET_MENU_ITEM_PROPERTY('ACTION_MENU.DELETE_MENU',ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 
 SET_MENU_ITEM_PROPERTY('ACTION_MENU.REFRESH_MENU',ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_MENU_ITEM_PROPERTY('ACTION_MENU.PRINT_MENU',ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_MENU_ITEM_PROPERTY('NAVIGATION_MENU.PRINT_HIDE',ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_MENU_ITEM_PROPERTY('ACTION_MENU.EXIT_MENU',ENABLED,PROPERTY_TRUE);

 PCKG_GCNSTS.pnum_reconnect:=1;

Trigger.Name: KEY-EXIT
Trigger.TriggerText:
DECLARE
 
 LVCH_STARTING_FORM VARCHAR2(300);
 LVCH_CURRENT_FORM VARCHAR2(300);
 
BEGIN
 
 LVCH_STARTING_FORM := :SYSTEM.CURRENT_FORM;
 
 LOOP
 
 NEXT_FORM;
 
 LVCH_CURRENT_FORM := :SYSTEM.CURRENT_FORM;

 EXIT WHEN LVCH_STARTING_FORM = LVCH_CURRENT_FORM;
 EXIT_FORM;
 END LOOP;




END;

SYNCHRONIZE;

 IF PRO_SHOW_ALERT('ALRT_EXIT_APPL','Exit Application','
Are you sure, you want to Exit the Main Menu ?
')=ALERT_BUTTON1 THEN
 EXIT_FORM;
 END IF;
--PCKG_MT_MENU_TRGRS.PRO_KEY_EXIT;

Trigger.Name: ON-ERROR
Trigger.TriggerText:
IF ERROR_TYPE = 'FRM' AND ERROR_CODE = 40735 THEN --FIELD IS PROTECTED AGAINST UPDATE
 NULL;
ELSIF ERROR_TYPE = 'FRM' AND ERROR_CODE = 47307 THEN --FIELD IS PROTECTED AGAINST UPDATE
 NULL;
ELSIF ERROR_TYPE = 'FRM' AND ERROR_CODE = 47316 THEN --BRANCH NODE WITH NOCHILDREN ARE NOT ALLOWED TO COLLAPSE
 NULL;

ELSE
 
 PCKG_FORMS.PRO_ON_ERROR;
END IF;
